titles.title: Legion
titles.description: Diagnosed with schizophrenia as a child, David Haller has been in and out of psychiatric hospitals for years, and now as an adult finds himself institutionalized again. The monotony of his daily routine is upended when troubled new patient Syd arrives, and they are inexplicably drawn to each other. After a startling encounter between the two, David confronts the possibility that the voices he hears and visions he sees may, in fact, be real.
titles.shortDescription: Inspired by the Marvel Comics character, an institutionalized young man diagnosed with schizophrenia discovers the voices he hears may in fact be real.

titles.title: The Vampire Diaries
titles.description: Two vampire brothers decide to visit the town of Mystic Falls where they both fall for the same girl, Elena Gilbert. She gets into a relationship with the younger brother, Stefan Salvatore. However, her entire world turns upside down when she learns an overwhelming truth about herself and the reality of the vampire brothers.
titles.shortDescription: Two vampire brothers visit Mystic Falls where they both fall for the same girl, Elena Gilbert. She gets into a relationship with the younger brother. However, her entire world turns upside down when she learns the reality of the vampire brothers.

titles.title: Britannia
titles.description: When the Romans invade Britain in 43AD, Kerra, daughter of the King of the Cantii, is forced to join with arch-rival Queen Antedia to face their invaders. The Romans are determined to succeed where Caesar failed and conquer this mythical land at the far edge of the Roman Empire. As tribes and Druids unite to fight the Romans, Kerra is thrust into the most important role of her life as she spearheads the resistance against the might of the Roman army.
titles.shortDescription: In 43AD the Roman army returns to crush Britannia, a mysterious land led by warrior women and druids who channel powerful underworld forces.

titles.title: Power
titles.description: Empires are built on power, and wealthy drug kingpin James St. Patrick has it all. Adept at managing his narcotics business, St. Patrick is known as “Ghost” because no one can connect him to his well-planned drug dealing network. As his double life begins to take its toll, a new venture provides the opportunity to make the break from his illicit dealings. Executive produced by Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson.
titles.shortDescription: A crime series with a hip-hop flavor, this violent, sexy and slick series is executive produced by Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson, and is heavily influenced by a rich history of mob tales.

titles.title: The Walking Dead
titles.description: Gritty ‘edge-of-your-seat’ thriller that portrays the world after a zombie apocalypse. Led by deputy sheriff Rick Grimes, a group of survivors find themselves constantly on the move in search of a safe and secure home. But the pressure each day to stay alive sends many in the group to the deepest depths of human cruelty, and Rick discovers that the overwhelming fear of the survivors can be more terrifying than the undead walking among them.
titles.shortDescription: Riveting ‘edge-of-your-seat’ thriller series. After a zombie apocalypse, a group of survivors discover that the overwhelming fear of the living is far more deadly than the ‘undead’ walking among them.

titles.title: The 100
titles.description: Ninety-seven years after nuclear radiation rendered the Earth uninhabitable for human survival, a group of one hundred young law-breakers is sent to Earth from 'The Ark' as a test to see if humans can survive there. As they strive to make their survival possible, they soon learn that they are not the only ones residing on Earth, and for those who are already present, they are not welcome at all.
titles.shortDescription: Ninety-seven years after nuclear radiation rendered the Earth uninhabitable for human survival, a group of one hundred young law-breakers is sent to Earth from 'The Ark' as a test to see if humans can survive there.

titles.title: Weeds
titles.description: Emmy and Golden Globe-nominated comedy drama series. Suburban mom Nancy Botwin (Mary-Louise Parker in her Golden Globe-winning role) finds herself in a financial crisis after her husband, Judah, dies suddenly. With no other option available she resorts to selling illicit substances, using a fake bakery to move the goods. Aided by her wayward brother-in-law, she watches her entire neighborhood degenerate into addiction as she struggles to keep her new means of bill-solving secret from suspicious PTA members, her nosy neighbors, and her children.
titles.shortDescription: Emmy and Golden Globe-nominated comedy drama series. After her husband dies, a suburban mother starts dealing illicit substances to maintain her privileged lifestyle.

titles.title: Knightfall
titles.description: The Knights Templar were the most powerful, wealthy and mysterious military order of the Middle Ages, entrusted with protecting Christianity’s most prized relic – the Holy Grail – and harboring secrets capable of great destruction. Delve deep into the clandestine world of the legendary brotherhood of warrior monks to discover their complex relationship with the King of France, and the betrayal that would ultimately lead to their tragic dissolution.
titles.shortDescription: Historical fiction series produced by Jeremy Renner. A look at the final days of Knights Templar during the 14th century.

titles.title: Arrow
titles.description: A billionaire playboy, Oliver Queen, presumed dead by everyone, was stranded on an island for five years. He returns home with just one goal in mind, to protect his city from the criminals. In the eyes of citizens, he is a wealthy business tycoon, but secretly, he battles crimes and punishes criminals as a vigilante known by the name of Hood.
titles.shortDescription: A billionaire playboy presumed dead by everyone, returns home after five years, with just one goal in mind, to protect his city from the criminals. In the eyes of citizens, he is a wealthy businessman, but secretly, he battles crimes as a vigilante.

titles.title: Friends
titles.description: Top-rated comedy series about six twenty-something friends – neat freak chef Monica, spoilt daddy’s girl Rachel, offbeat massage therapist Phoebe, geeky paleontologist Ross, sardonic dry wit Chandler, and womanizing actor Joey – who share life, love and laughter in Manhattan.
titles.shortDescription: Top-rated comedy series about the lives, loves, and laughs of six twenty-something friends living in Manhattan.

titles.title: BLINDSPOT
titles.description: FBI agent Kurt Weller is drawn into a complex conspiracy when a naked amnesiac, Jane Doe, is found covered from head-to-toe in a series of cryptic tattoos... including his name on her back. As Weller and his colleagues investigate the tattooed ‘clues’, they are drawn into a high-stakes underworld that twists and turns through a labyrinth of secrets and revelations – and the information they uncover might ultimately change the world.
titles.shortDescription: An FBI agent is drawn into a complex conspiracy when a naked amnesiac woman is found in Times Square covered in a series of cryptic tattoos.

titles.title: Supergirl
titles.description: Twelve year-old Kara escaped the doomed planet Krypton at the same time as her infant cousin Kal-El – AKA Superman – but didn't arrive on Earth until many years later. Raised by an adoptive family, Kara spent so many years trying to fit in that she forgot to ever stand out. All that changes when she decides to embrace her superhuman abilities and become the hero she was always destined to be. With the help of her friends and the super-secret Department of Extra-Normal Operations, Kara – now known as Supergirl – takes to the skies to protect her world.
titles.shortDescription: After years of keeping her powers secret, Superman's cousin – Kara Zor-El – finally embraces her superhuman abilities to become the hero she was always meant to be.

titles.title: Atlanta
titles.description: Alfred Miles is an up-and-coming new rap artist who is trying to walk the line between real life and street life. Alfred – AKA “Paper Boi” – is managed by his cousin, Earnest "Earn" Marks, who gets caught up in the local rap scene and his cousin's new career after returning home to Atlanta. Earn does whatever he can to try to get Alfred's career to the next level, helped by other members of Alfred's entourage – including Darius, Alfred’s dopey right-hand man and visionary.
titles.shortDescription: Comedy series created by and starring Donald Glover. Two cousins try to work their way up through the Atlanta rap scene.

titles.title: Taboo
titles.description: Believed to be long dead, James Keziah Delaney returns home to 1814 London after ten years in Africa to inherit what is left of his father's shipping empire and rebuild a life for himself. But his father's legacy is a poisoned chalice, and Delaney finds himself in a face-off against the East India Company, whilst playing a dangerous game between two warring nations – Britain and America. With enemies lurking in every dark corner, James must navigate increasingly complex territories to avoid his own death sentence. Encircled by conspiracy, murder, and betrayal, a dark family mystery unfolds.
titles.shortDescription: Returning to London after ten years away, a 19th-century adventurer (Tom Hardy) discovers he has been left a mysterious legacy by his father. Executive produced by Ridley Scott.

titles.title: Vikings
titles.description: Frustrated by the policies of the local chieftain who sends his Viking raiders to the poor Baltic states of the east, Ragnar Lothbrok works on a secret plan to head west, across the ocean, to discover rich new civilizations. When Ragnar teams up with his boat builder friend Floki to craft a new generation of intrepid ships capable of conquering the rough northern seas, the stage is set for conflict.
titles.shortDescription: Hugely popular historical drama series about the brutal world of a Viking warrior who yearns to explore – and raid – the distant shores across the ocean.

titles.title: Pretty Little Liars
titles.description: Time passes by since Alison went missing. Being the leader of the group, only she was aware of the girls' secrets. Until, one day, Spencer Hastings, Aria Montgomery, Hanna Marin and Emily Fields start receiving messages from a mysterious 'A', threatening to reveal the secrets only Alison knew. At first, the girls think Alison herself is behind them, but they soon realize that they are wrong, and someone else is keeping a close eye on them.
titles.shortDescription: Time passes by since Alison went missing. Being the leader of the group, only she was aware of the girls' secrets. Until, one day, the girls start receiving messages from a mysterious 'A', threatening to reveal the secrets only Alison knew.

titles.title: The Flash
titles.description: After being struck by dark matter lightning in his lab, forensic scientist Barry Allen develops the ability to move at superhuman speed. Barry discovers that many other people were affected by the event – most of whom are using their newfound powers for evil. Determined to be a force for good, Barry becomes ‘The Flash’, and dedicates his life to fighting these threats. However, secret forces are determined to manipulate him for their own agenda.
titles.shortDescription: After being struck by dark matter lightning, a forensic scientist uses his new powers of super speed to become a superhero – The Flash.

titles.title: Laal Kabootar
titles.description: Adeel is a cab driver while Aliya is a widow desperate to find and bring justice to the target killers who murdered her husband. In a circumstantial meeting, the two realize they can help each other. Adeel, through his contacts on the streets, can help Aliya find her husband’s murderer. In exchange, she’ll give him enough money to flee to Dubai. But neither of them realize they’re in over their heads, and so begins an intriguing cat and mouse game through the streets of Karachi.
titles.shortDescription: While Adeel is looking for a way to escape to Dubai, Alia is determined to avenge the murder of her husband. As they both indulge in individual scheming and plotting, they are unaware of what they are getting themselves into: threats, torment, and the potential unveiling of a crooked empire.

titles.title: Body Of Lies
titles.description: Big screen adaptation of David Ignatius' novel, 'Body Of Lies'. When CIA operative Roger Ferris uncovers evidence indicating that a major terrorist leader may be operating out of Jordan, he enlists the aid of CIA veteran Ed Hoffman in infiltrating the elusive saboteur's vast underground network.
titles.shortDescription: A CIA agent (Leonardo DiCaprio), caught between his American supervisors and Jordanian intelligence, hunts down a powerful terrorist leader. Directed by Ridley Scott.

titles.title: Entourage
titles.description: Movie star, Vince Chase, gets an offer from his former agent Ari Gold, to play a lead role in his first production. But when Ari demands on directing the film as well, that is when budget gets way out of hand.
titles.shortDescription: Movie star, Vince Chase, gets an offer from his former agent, to play a lead role in his first production, but when Ari demands on directing the film as well, that is when budget gets way out of hand.

titles.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
titles.description: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.
titles.shortDescription: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

titleLocalized.en: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows

titles.title: Jupiter Ascending
titles.description: Jupiter Jones, unaware that she was born with a much greater purpose, cleans other people's houses as an ordinary woman. A genetically engineered hunter named Caine is sent to Earth with a mission to rescue Jupiter and to inform her of the truth that her genetic signature marks her as an heiress of intergalactic nobility. She is destined to fight an ancient and catastrophic entity to save the Earth and its inhabitants.
titles.shortDescription: Jupiter Jones is unaware that she was born with a much greater destiny until a genetically engineered hunter is sent to Earth to rescue and to inform her of the truth that her genetic signature marks her as an heiress of intergalactic nobility.

titles.title: I Am Legend
titles.description: Robert Neville, an extraordinary scientist is the only man left on Earth. When an epidemic hit, it killed most of the people and transformed the rest into bloodthirsty monsters. As he wanders alone on the streets of the New York City desperately trying to find a cure to save the mutants, he is aware that he is largely outnumbered. Fighting his own battle, will he be able to fulfill his mission and achieve the impossible?
titles.shortDescription: Robert Neville is the only man left on Earth after an epidemic hit and killed most of the people while transformed the rest into bloodthirsty monsters. Desperately trying to find a cure, he is aware that he is largely outnumbered.

titles.title: Godzilla
titles.description: Not long after he is reunited with his family that Ford Brody is persuaded by his father, Joe, to move to Japan to help him. They are both caught up in a battle as Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to kill two malicious monstrous creatures that threaten to destroy the human world. Humans stand defenseless watching the combat as the incredible creature strives to reinstate balance and harmony, leaving a trail of destruction in its way.
titles.shortDescription: Ford Brody is persuaded by his father, Joe, to move to Japan to help him. They are both caught up in a battle as Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to kill two malicious monstrous creatures that threaten to destroy the human world.

titles.title: Focus
titles.description: Nothing messes up the plans of a talented con man more than a talented con woman. Margot Robbie and Will Smith star in this comedy crime movie, that takes us on a thrilling adventure into the marvelous world of con artists.
titles.shortDescription: Nothing messes up the plans of a talented con man more than a talented con woman. Margot Robbie and Will Smith star in this comedy crime movie, that takes us on a thrilling adventure into the marvelous world of con artists.

titles.title: The Golden Compass
titles.description: Lyra Belacqua resides in an alternate world where part of the soul lives outside the human body as a companion known as daemons. After her best friend disappears, with the help of her daemon, a tribe of seafarers, a witch, an ice bear, and a Texas airman, she sets out to the far North on a mission to rescue not only her best friend from the mysterious organization and save her own world but our world as well.
titles.shortDescription: Lyra resides in an alternate world where part of the soul lives outside the human body as a companion known as daemons. After her best friend disappears, she sets out on a mission to rescue not only him and save her own world but ours as well.

titles.title: Clash of the Titans
titles.description: Perseus, the son of Zeus, is a demigod but is brought up as a man. Caught in a war between the gods, he sets out on a dangerous expedition to save the earth and the heaven from Hades, a vengeful god of the underworld. For that purpose, he builds an army of warriors to prevent him from seizing power from the king of gods. Trying to create his own destiny and defying his fate, Perseus wages a war against the demons.
titles.shortDescription: Perseus, the son of Zeus, is a demigod. Caught in a war between the gods, he sets out on a dangerous expedition to save the earth as well as the heaven from Hades who is a vengeful god of the underworld.

titles.title: The Hangover
titles.description: Doug and his three friends travel to Las Vegas for a mind-blowing and memorable bachelor party two days prior to his wedding. They get so drunk that the next morning when they wake up, they have absolutely no memory of the previous night and are startled to find a tiger and a small baby in their suite. Doug goes missing and the three friends set out on a quest to find him and take him back to Los Angeles in time to read his vows. But will they be able to find Doug in time?
titles.shortDescription: Doug and his three friends travel to Las Vegas for a bachelor party prior to his wedding. They get so drunk that they have no memory of the previous night. Doug goes missing and the three try to find him in time to read his vows.

titles.title: Beowulf
titles.description: Beowulf, a brave warrior, offers King Hrothgar to rid his kingdom of the vicious troll-like beast called Grendel that interrupts their celebrations every time. After successfully slaying the beast, he is awarded a golden drinking horn by the king. Little does Beowulf know that he has incurred the wrath of a vicious creature, Grendel's mother, who can transform into as beautiful a woman as she can be vengeful! Soon she begins killing everyone out of vengeance.
titles.shortDescription: Beowulf offers the King to rid his kingdom of the vicious beast, Grendel. He successfully slays it but is unaware that he has incurred the wrath of Grendel's mother who is vengeful and seductive. Soon she begins killing everyone out of vengeance.

titles.title: The Lego Movie
titles.description: An ordinary rules-following LEGO construction worker, Emmet, is mistakenly recognized to be the "special", who is prophesized to save the world. For that purpose, he is recruited by a group of strangers that include a LEGO Batman and an old mystic, to stop the plans of an evil tyrant of conquering the world. Together with his fellows, he sets out on an epic expedition for which he is hopelessly and amusingly unprepared!
titles.shortDescription: An ordinary LEGO figurine is mistakenly recognized to be the "special", who is intended to save the world. He is recruited by a group of strangers to stop the plans of an evil tyrant of conquering the world, a mission for which he is not prepared.

titles.title: Arthur
titles.description: Rich playboy, Arthur Bach, always relies on two things: his great fortune and the wisdom of his lifelong nanny. But now he is faced with the most crucial decision of his life. He has to choose to either get into an arranged marriage in order to save his family's riches or be with the love of his life and sacrifice his billion-dollar inheritance along with everything else that he has. Torn between the choices, he needs to stand up for what he desires more.
titles.shortDescription: Rich playboy, Arthur Bach, always relies on two things: his great fortune and the wisdom of his lifelong nanny. But now he is faced with the decision of either getting into an arranged marriage or being with the love of his life.

titles.title: 22 Jump Street
titles.description: Although they made their way through high school successfully, an investigation at a local college brings big changes for undercover officers Jenko and Schmidt. When Jenko meets a kindred spirit on the football team and Schmidt infiltrates the bohemian art major scene, both men begin to question their partnership. Not only do they have to crack the case, but now the two overgrown adolescents must learn how to behave like adults.
titles.shortDescription: Having successfully navigated the challenges of high school, the baby-faced undercover police officers Jenko (Channing Tatum) and Schmidt (Jonah Hill) find that their investigation at a local college delivers big changes.

titles.title: Sherlock Holmes
titles.description: When a string of brutal murders terrorizes London, it doesn't take long for legendary detective Sherlock Holmes and his crime-solving partner, Dr. Watson, to find the killer, Lord Blackwood. A devotee of the dark arts, Blackwood has a bigger scheme in mind, and his execution plays right into his plans. The game is afoot when Blackwood seems to rise from the grave, plunging Holmes and Watson into the world of the occult and strange technologies.
titles.shortDescription: Sherlock Holmes and his partner Dr. Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England. Stars Robert Downey Jr. and Jude Law.

titles.title: Hacksaw Ridge
titles.description: This film portrays the true story of Desmond T. Doss, a WWII American Army Medic. In spite of refusing to kill people, he ended up becoming the first man in American history who won a Congressional Medal of Honor after he selflessly and without taking a human life, saved the lives of seventy-five men in the Battle of Okinawa.
titles.shortDescription: This film portrays the true story of Desmond T. Doss, a WWII American Army Medic. Despite refusing to kill people, he ended up becoming the first man in American history who won a Congressional Medal of Honor for saving the lives of men.

titles.title: Valkyrie
titles.description: Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg is a loyal German officer who serves his country while hoping that someone will find a way to stop Hitler. Realizing that time is running out, he joins the German resistance with a plan to assassinate Hitler and over-throw his Nazi government from the inside. With the future of the world hanging in the balance, Stauffenberg is thrust from being one of the many who oppose Hitler to the one who must kill Hitler himself.
titles.shortDescription: Tom Cruise stars in a true story - A daring plot to eliminate one of the evilest tyrants the world has ever known - Hitler.

titles.title: Catch Me If You Can
titles.description: Based on a true story about Frank Abagnale Jr. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a con-artist who successfully posed as an airline pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 18th birthday. Tom Hanks also stars as the FBI Agent Carl Hanratty, the man assigned with the task of bringing Frank to justice. A cat and mouse chase over several years ensues with close encounters, astounding lies, and betrayed love.
titles.shortDescription: Leonardo DiCaprio stars in the true story about a con artist who posed as a lawyer, an airline pilot, and a doctor - all before his 18th birthday.

titles.title: Contagion
titles.description: Beth Emhoff dies two days after her return from Hong Kong to Minnesota. Ever since her return, she had been feeling sick but she contributed her sickness to jet lag. Soon after the doctors inform her startled husband of her death, many others start demonstrating the same symptoms. While the doctors strive to contain the illness, everyone watches, horrified, as this illness starts to multiply drastically encompassing the world.
titles.shortDescription: Beth Emhoff dies two days after her return from Hong Kong. Soon after, many others start demonstrating the same symptoms. Everyone watches, horrified, as this illness starts to spread drastically, encompassing the world.

titles.title: The Great Gatsby
titles.description: Nick, a would-be writer, arrives in New York in 1922, where he lands next door to Jay Gatsby, a millionaire and across the bay from Daisy, his cousin and her womanizing husband. He receives an invitation to the party at the mysterious Jay Gatsby's house, where he finds himself attracted to the lifestyle of the rich and wealthy. Bearing witness to the drama in their lives, he jots down the tales of love, misfortune, and deceit.
titles.shortDescription: Nick, a writer, arrives in New York in 1922, where he lands next door to Jay Gatsby, a millionaire. He finds himself attracted to the lifestyle of the wealthy. Bearing witness to the drama in their lives, he jots down the tales of love and deceit.

titles.title: The Dark Knight
titles.description: Batman has been able to keep the crime in Gotham City in control. The emergence of a young criminal, Joker, wreaks havoc among the citizens of the city. To fight injustice, the Dark Knight must prepare himself for an epic battle of his life.
titles.shortDescription: Batman has been able to keep the crime in Gotham City in control. The emergence of a young criminal, Joker, wreaks havoc among the citizens of the city. To fight injustice, the Dark Knight must prepare himself for an epic battle of his life.

titles.title: San Andreas
titles.description: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.
titles.shortDescription: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

titles.title: Supergirl
titles.description: Twelve year-old Kara escaped the doomed planet Krypton at the same time as her infant cousin Kal-El – AKA Superman – but didn't arrive on Earth until many years later. titles.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
titles.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.
titles.shortDescription: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

titles.title: Motorcycle Girl
titles.description: As Zenith Irfan sets out to fulfill the dreams of her dead father, at the age of 20 years, she becomes an overnight sensation and grabs the attention on media as the first Pakistani woman to have traveled alone through the difficult and dangerous northern areas of the country.
titles.shortDescription: As Zenith Irfan sets out to fulfill the dreams of her dead father, she becomes an overnight sensation and grabs the attention on media as the first Pakistani woman to have traveled alone through the dangerous northern areas of the country.

titles.title: Interstellar
titles.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
titles.shortDescription: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

titles.shortDescription: Top-rated comedy series about the lives, loves, and laughs of six twenty-something friends living in Manhattan.

titles.title: PK
titles.description: An alien's view of the world challenges people's long-held notions, making friends of some, and foes of others. His childlike curiosity takes him on a journey of love, laughter, and letting go.
titles.shortDescription: An alien's view of the world challenges people's long-held notions, making friends of some, and foes of others.

titles.title: Chudail Story
titles.description: Five friends, Chandu, Goldie, Robby, Riya and Devika, decide to go on an adventurous trip, but before they reach their destination, their car breaks down. While awaiting help, they take shelter in a house owned by Shashi, a mysterious woman with mesmerizing looks. Distracted by her beauty, the friends find themselves trapped, and escape is no longer an option.
titles.shortDescription: A seductive witch (Preeti Soni) kills men by casting a spell on them.

titles.title: Vikings
titles.description: Frustrated by the policies of the local chieftain who sends his Viking raiders to the poor Baltic states of the east, Ragnar Lothbrok works on a secret plan to head west, across the ocean, to discover rich new civilizations. titles.title: Kaash Keh
titles.description: Kaash keh is an Original series which comprises of four films, each of which follows two main characters whose lives are interconnected in such a way that it leads them to regret. Find out what happens as the story unravels in each film.
titles.shortDescription: Kaash keh is an Original series which comprises of four films, each of which follows two main characters whose lives are interconnected in such a way that it leads them to regret. Find out what happens as the story unravels in each film.

titles.title: The Vampire Diaries
titles.description: Two vampire brothers decide to visit the town of Mystic Falls where they both fall for the same girl, Elena Gilbert. She gets into a relationship with the younger brother, Stefan Salvatore. However, her entire world turns upside down when she learns an overwhelming truth about herself and the reality of the vampire brothers.
titles.shortDescription: Two vampire brothers visit Mystic Falls where they both fall for the same girl, Elena Gilbert. She gets into a relationship with the younger brother. However, her entire world turns upside down when she learns the reality of the vampire brothers.

titles.title: Contagion
titles.description: Beth Emhoff dies two days after her return from Hong Kong to Minnesota. Ever since her return, she had been feeling sick but she contributed her sickness to jet lag. Soon after the doctors inform her startled husband of her death, many others start demonstrating the same symptoms. While the doctors strive to contain the illness, everyone watches, horrified, as this illness starts to multiply drastically encompassing the world.
titles.shortDescription: Beth Emhoff dies two days after her return from Hong Kong. Soon after, many others start demonstrating the same symptoms. Everyone watches, horrified, as this illness starts to spread drastically, encompassing the world.

titles.title: Bang Bang
titles.description: After a chance encounter with a fugitive spy, a bank receptionist is swept into a world of drama, danger and espionage.
titles.shortDescription: After a chance encounter with a fugitive spy, a bank receptionist is swept into a world of drama, danger and espionage.

titles.title: Spartacus: Blood And Sand
titles.description: Season one of the acclaimed STARZ Original series. Betrayed by the Romans. Forced into slavery. Reborn as a Gladiator. The classic tale of the Republic's most infamous rebel comes alive in this graphic and visceral series. Torn from his homeland and the woman he loves, Spartacus is condemned to the brutal world of the arena where blood and death are primetime entertainment. But not all battles are fought upon the sands. Treachery, corruption, and the allure of sensual pleasures will constantly test Spartacus. To survive, he must become more than a man. More than a gladiator, he must become a legend.
titles.shortDescription: Season one of the acclaimed STARZ Original series. The world of gladiators is graphically brought to life as the Roman Republic's most brutal fighters clash in the ultimate arena.

titles.title: Spectre
titles.description: James Bond sets out to uncover a sinister organization and learns that it goes by the name of SPECTRE. He seeks the help of Madeleine Swann, the daughter of an old adversary, whom he thinks may have intel on the organization. However, he soon discovers an unsettling connection between himself and the enemy he is looking for.
titles.shortDescription: Bond sets out to uncover a sinister organization and seeks the help of the daughter of an old adversary, whom he thinks may have intel on it. However, he soon discovers an unsettling connection between himself and the enemy he is looking for.

titles.title: BLINDSPOT
titles.description: FBI agent Kurt Weller is drawn into a complex conspiracy when a naked amnesiac, Jane Doe, is found covered from head-to-toe in a series of cryptic tattoos... including his name on her back. As Weller and his colleagues investigate the tattooed ‘clues’, they are drawn into a high-stakes underworld that twists and turns through a labyrinth of secrets and revelations – and the information they uncover might ultimately change the world.
titles.shortDescription: An FBI agent is drawn into a complex conspiracy when a naked amnesiac woman is found in Times Square covered in a series of cryptic tattoos.

titles.title: Laal Kabootar
titles.description: Adeel is a cab driver while Aliya is a widow desperate to find and bring justice to the target killers who murdered her husband. In a circumstantial meeting, the two realize they can help each other. Adeel, through his contacts on the streets, can help Aliya find her husband’s murderer. In exchange, she’ll give him enough money to flee to Dubai. But neither of them realize they’re in over their heads, and so begins an intriguing cat and mouse game through the streets of Karachi.
titles.shortDescription: While Adeel is looking for a way to escape to Dubai, Alia is determined to avenge the murder of her husband. As they both indulge in individual scheming and plotting, they are unaware of what they are getting themselves into: threats, torment, and the potential unveiling of a crooked empire.

titles.title: ROCKY BALBOA
titles.description: After thirty-years into retirement, Rocky Balboa, grieving over the death of his beloved wife named Adrian, decides to re-enter his boxing life on a lower level by indulging himself in local matches. However, all that changes drastically when he accepts a challenge to take on the most popular heavy-weight champion, Mason "The Line" Dixon.
titles.shortDescription: After thirty-years into retirement, Rocky decides to re-enter his boxing life on a lower level by indulging himself in local matches. However, all that changes drastically when he accepts a challenge to take on the most popular heavy-weight champion.

titles.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
titles.description: Lord Voldemort's return to the wizarding world means that the entire wizarding community is in peril. After his encounter with the Dark Lord, when Harry begins his fifth year at Hogwarts, he discovers that most of the wizarding world is in denial with the Dark Lord's return. Minister for magic along with all those who once used to believe Harry think that he and Headmaster Dumbledore are lying. Now the future of magic may depend only on Harry and the Order of the Phoenix.
titles.shortDescription: After his encounter with Voldemort, Harry begins his fifth year at Hogwarts where he discovers that most of the wizarding world thinks that he and Dumbledore are lying. The future of magic now depends only on Harry and the Order of the Phoenix.

titleLocalized.en: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

titles.title: ROCKY
titles.description: A small-time boxer named Rocky Balboa gets a very rare chance to take on a heavy-weight champion named Apollo Creed. Hence, he begins his training with the determined and courageous Mickey Goldmill while, at the same time, forming a love relationship with a shy woman named Adrian, who serves a local pet store.
titles.shortDescription: A small-time boxer named Rocky Balboa gets a rare chance to take on a heavy-weight champion named Apollo Creed. Hence, he begins his training with the courageous Goldmill while forming a relationship with a shy woman named Adrian.

titles.title: Blade
titles.description: Just when his mother was about to give birth to him, she got attacked by a vampire. Hence Blade was born as a half mortal and half immortal man. With the assistance of a vampire detective, Hannibal King, and Dracula-descendent, Frank Drake, he sets out to avenge the death of his mother and wipe the world clean of all evil vampires. His special blood type is what the vampires need in order to summon an evil god to erase all mankind from the world.
titles.shortDescription: Blade, a half mortal, half immortal man, sets out to avenge the death of his mother and wipe the world clean of all evil vampires. His special blood type is what the vampires need in order to summon an evil god to erase all mankind from the world.

titles.title: Batman Begins
titles.description: Bruce Wayne travels to the far-east after the death of his parents, where he is trained in martial arts by Henri Ducard, a member of the dangerous but honorable cult. After destruction hits Gotham City, Wayne returns with the intention of wiping the city clean of all the filth that has taken over it. With the help of his faithful butler, Alfred, and a tech expert, Lucius Fox, Batman comes into existence and begins its mission!
titles.shortDescription: Bruce Wayne travels to the far east, where he is trained in martial arts by a member of the dangerous but honorable cult. After destruction hits Gotham City, Wayne returns, as Batman, to wipe the city clean of all the filth that has taken over it.

titles.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
titles.description: Harry, Ron and Hermione set out on a mission to hunt and destroy the Horcruxes, objects that contain a fragment of Voldemort's soul. Death Eaters have seized control of the Ministry of Magic and Hogwarts. As Harry searches for clues, he uncovers the legend of the Deathly Hallows. Though the three must rely on each other now more than ever, dark forces threaten to tear them apart. While Harry is busy searching for something big, Voldemort's evil forces are valiantly searching for him everywhere.
titles.shortDescription: Harry, Ron, and Hermione continue their mission. Death Eaters have seized control of the Ministry and Hogwarts. Harry uncovers the legend of the Deathly Hallows. Though the three must rely on each other, dark forces threaten to tear them apart.

titleLocalized.en: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1

titles.title: Rush Hour 3
titles.description: LAPD Detective James Carter and Chinese Chief Inspector Lee unite once again after they learn about the attempted assassination on Ambassador Han and that the Chinese gangsters have spread themselves all the way to Paris. In order to track down the envelope that contains the identity of a potent crime lord, the two must always stay one step ahead of the Chinese triads.
titles.shortDescription: James and Lee reunite after they learn that the Chinese gangsters have spread themselves to Paris. In order to track down the envelope that contains the identity of a potent crime lord, the two must always stay one step ahead of the triads.

titles.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
titles.description: Harry Potter is grasped from the clutches of his aunt and uncle on his 11th birthday by Hagrid, where he discovers the mind-boggling truth about his parents' death. He also learns that he possesses unique magical powers of his own that are worth an invitation to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, an English boarding school for wizards. At that time, he is unaware of what he is getting himself into: adventure, unlearned truths, and near-death experiences!
titles.shortDescription: Harry Potter is grasped from the clutches of his aunt and uncle on his 11th birthday, where he discovers some mind-boggling truths. Upon accepting an invitation to Hogwarts, he is unaware of what he is getting himself into.

titleLocalized.en: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

titles.title: The Hobbit: The Battle Of The Five Armies
titles.description: Having reclaimed their homeland from the dragon Smaug, the Company of Dwarves has unwittingly unleashed a deadly force into the world. Enraged, Smaug rains his fiery wrath down upon Lake-town. But there are even greater dangers ahead as Sauron instigates a stealth attack upon the Lonely Mountain. Bilbo finds himself fighting for his life and the lives of his friends in the epic Battle Of The Five Armies, as the future of Middle-Earth hangs in the balance.
titles.shortDescription: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war to keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

titleLocalized.en: The Hobbit: The Battle Of The Five Armies

titles.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
titles.description: Looking forward to the Quidditch World Cup, Harry moves in to stay with Hermione and the Weasleys. With the Triwizard Tournament coming up, an event that involves two other rival schools of magic, Durmstrang Institute and Beauxbatons Academy, Harry returns for his fourth year at Hogwarts only to find that he himself is competing in the hazardous tournament. Fighting his way through the three challenges in the midst of trying to lead a normal life, Harry faces a deadly encounter with his enemy.
titles.shortDescription: Harry returns for his fourth year at Hogwarts only to find that he is competing in the Triwizard Tournament. Fighting his way through the challenges amidst trying to lead a normal life, Harry faces a deadly encounter with his enemy.

titleLocalized.en: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

titles.title: Batman Returns
titles.description: An evil businessman Max Shreck and a grisly Penguin, who resides in the sewers under the city, team up to take over Gotham City. As they spread terror and fear in the citizens, it is only up to the Batman to stop them once and for all. Meanwhile, a cat-woman, who was almost killed by Shreck, also joins their agenda of defeating Batman but when she comes face to face with him, unexpected feelings emerge.
titles.shortDescription: An evil businessman Max Shreck and a grisly Penguin team up to take over Gotham City. As they spread terror in the citizens, it is only up to the Batman to stop them. Meanwhile, a cat-woman also joins forces with them to defeat the Batman.

titles.title: Final Destination 3
titles.description: Wendy, a high-school student, goes to an amusement park with a group of friends. They decide to take a roller coaster ride. However, Wendy has a sudden strong premonition that something will go wrong and they will not be able to make it till the end of the ride. She manages to save a few people along with her and they watch as everyone on the roller coaster dies. They weren't supposed to escape their fate, which is why the grim reaper sets out to take those it was meant to take with it!
titles.shortDescription: Wendy goes to an amusement park with her friends. They decide to ride on a roller coaster. However, Wendy has a premonition that something will go wrong. She saves a few people but death sets out to collect those it was meant to take with it!

titles.title: Blade II
titles.description: Blade, half-man and half-vampire, is consumed by a thirst to avenge the death of his mother and save mankind from blood-sucking vampires. But as Reapers, terrifying creatures who feed on vampires, rise to the front threatening both mankind and vampires, he is compelled to form an unwanted coalition with the vampires to defeat them.
titles.shortDescription: Blade is consumed by a thirst to avenge his mother's death and save mankind from vampires. But as Reapers rise to the front threatening both mankind and vampires, he is compelled to form an unwanted coalition!

titles.title: The Final Destination
titles.description: Nick O'Bannon, while out with his friends at the track, has a ghastly premonition that he and his friends are going to die in a deadly car race. He manages to save them mere seconds before his horrific vision comes to life. Despite the fact that they have cheated death, death will not stop until it gets what it wants! The reaper will keep lurking around them until it makes sure that each of them has met the end that they were supposed to.
titles.shortDescription: Nick O'Bannon, has a ghastly premonition that he and his friends are going to die in a deadly car race. He manages to save them mere seconds before his horrific vision comes to life but death will not stop until it gets what it wants!

titles.title: ROCKY II
titles.description: After losing a match with the world-class heavy-weight champion, Apollo Creed, and losing not only his money but also the respect of his friends and family, Rocky Balboa has accepted another challenge to fight Apollo Creed again. Against the wishes of his wife, Adrian, Rocky decides to give it one more chance to regain everything that he lost in the previous match.
titles.shortDescription: After losing a match with Apollo Creed, Rocky Balboa has accepted another challenge to fight him again. Against the wishes of his wife, Rocky decides to give it one more chance to regain everything he lost in the previous match.

titles.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
titles.description: With a convicted murderer, Sirius Black, Lord Voldemort's most loyal death eater who is charged with killing 13 people with a single curse on the loose, entire Hogwarts might be at risk. Harry has to face lots of challenges what with a deranged killer after him and Hogwarts swarming with Azkaban's guards, nasty species that seem to affect Harry a lot more than they affect any other. Thanks to a mysterious new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, Harry may not be as helpless as he seems.
titles.shortDescription: With a convicted murderer on the loose, Harry has to face lots of challenges at Hogwarts this year. Thanks to the new teacher, Harry may not be as helpless as he seems.

titleLocalized.en: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

titles.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation Of Smaug
titles.description: Having survived the first part of their unsettling journey, Bilbo Baggins and his companions continue east. More dangers await them, including the skin-changer Beorn and the giant spiders of Milkwood. After escaping capture by the dangerous Wood Elves, Bilbo and the dwarves journey to Lake-town and, finally, to the Lonely Mountain, where they face the greatest danger of all: the fearsome dragon Smaug.
titles.shortDescription: The adventures of Bilbo Baggins and his epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor continues. Directed by Oscar-winning filmmaker Peter Jackson.

titleLocalized.en: The Hobbit: The Desolation Of Smaug

titles.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
titles.description: Raging a battle with the dark forces and time, Harry, Ron, and Hermione prepare for the final battle by continuing their search for Lord Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes. They face several encounters on their way, wanted and unwanted both. A long forgotten army surges again. Harry and the Dark Lord meet at Hogwarts Castle for an epic final confrontation where the forces of good and evil finally come face to face with each other.
titles.shortDescription: Harry, Ron, and Hermione prepare for the final battle by continuing their search for the remaining Horcruxes. Harry and Voldemort meet at Hogwarts for the final confrontation where the forces of good and evil finally come face to face with each other.

titleLocalized.en: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2

titles.title: Blade: Trinity
titles.description: Blade, part-human and part-vampire, is framed for numerous murders that he did not commit by Danica Talos, a vampire leader who is hell-bent on finally making her team victorious. In the midst of being hunted by the FBI due to his bad publicity and in his efforts to try to save humanity from blood-thirsty vampires, he has no choice left than to join forces with a crew of rogue vampire hunters led by Hannibal King and Whistler's daughter, Abigail.
titles.shortDescription: Blade, part-human and part-vampire, is framed for numerous murders. In the midst of being hunted by the FBI and in his efforts to try to save humanity from vampires, he has no choice left than to join forces with a crew of rogue vampire hunters.

titles.title: Batman Forever
titles.description: Batman has to face two villains: district attorney Harvey Dent now known as Two-Face and Wayne Enterprises employee Edward Nygma, now known as The Riddler who seeks revenge against his previous employer for firing him. The two villains join forces to drain the minds of the residents of Gotham City and to defeat Batman. Batman gets help from a circus performer Dick Grayson who seeks vengeance against Two-Face for murdering his parents.
titles.shortDescription: Batman has to face two villains who team up to drain the minds of the City's residents and to defeat Batman. With the help of a circus performer who seeks vengeance against Two-Face for murdering his parents, Batman sets out to defeat the villains.

titles.title: The Dark Knight
titles.description: Batman has been able to keep the crime in Gotham City in control. The emergence of a young criminal, Joker, wreaks havoc among the citizens of the city. To fight injustice, the Dark Knight must prepare himself for an epic battle of his life.
titles.shortDescription: Batman has been able to keep the crime in Gotham City in control. The emergence of a young criminal, Joker, wreaks havoc among the citizens of the city. To fight injustice, the Dark Knight must prepare himself for an epic battle of his life.

titles.title: Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince
titles.description: With Voldemort out in the open, no one is safe! As Death Eaters spread a spirit of terror, Dumbledore becomes more intent than ever on preparing Harry for the final battle. While Harry is learning about Voldemort's past, he is only mildly aware of the other dangers lurking within the castle walls. Harry and Ginny's relationship turns into something serious while Ron and Hermione are still figuring out theirs. A tragedy at the end confirms that Hogwarts will never be the same place again.
titles.shortDescription: With Voldemort out in the open and Death Eaters spreading terror, Dumbledore becomes more intent on preparing Harry for the final battle. While Harry is learning about Voldemort's past, a tragedy confirms that Hogwarts will never be the same place again.

titleLocalized.en: Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince

titles.title: ROCKY IV
titles.description: Rocky Balboa intends to retire and live a peaceful life with his wife named Adrian after earning the title of boxing championship. However, when his best friend gets brutally beaten to death during a match by Ivan Drago, a Russian newcomer, Rocky sets out to get payback against him and flies to Russia. Will he be able to defeat his adversary in an intense and long match?
titles.shortDescription: Rocky intends to retire and live a peaceful life with his wife after earning the title of boxing championship. However, when his best friend gets brutally beaten to death during a match by Ivan Drago, Rocky sets out to get payback against him.

titles.title: Rush Hour
titles.description: Hong Kong Detective, Inspector Lee, is called to assist the FBI when a Chinese diplomat's daughter is kidnapped in Los Angeles. The FBI, not wanting to involve the Inspector, cast him away and dump him off on the LAPD who put Detective James Carter on the task of keeping him away from the investigation. But these unwanted misfit detectives will do everything in their power to find the missing girl.
titles.shortDescription: Inspector Lee is called to assist the FBI in the kidnapping case of a diplomat's daughter. The FBI, not wanting to involve the Inspector, dump him off on the LAPD who put Detective James Carter on the task of keeping him away from the investigation.

titles.title: The Dark Knight Rises
titles.description: With the apparition of a mysterious cunning cat burglar in Gotham City and a ruthless masked terrorist named Bane beginning an agenda of massive destruction, Batman is forced to return from his exile after eight years to save the city. However, Batman is only indulging himself in a battle that he may not be able to win against Bane.
titles.shortDescription: When a cunning cat-woman and a brutal terrorist, Bane, start an agenda of massive destruction in Gotham City, Batman is forced to return from his exile. However, Batman is only indulging himself in a battle that he may not be able to win

titles.title: Batman And Robin
titles.description: Batman and his partner, Robin, team up to defeat a new deranged gang of super-villains. Amongst them, the most dangerous ones are Mr. Freeze, who likes to turn everyone and everything into snow and plans to turn Gotham City into an arctic region, and Poison Ivy, a woman who targets her victims by poisoning them. As the two heroes fight against these villains, they are joined by a third hero, the Batgirl.
titles.shortDescription: Batman and Robin team up to defeat a deranged gang of super-villains. Amongst them, the most dangerous ones are Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy. As the two heroes fight against these villains, they are joined by a third hero, the Batgirl.

titles.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
titles.description: The first film in the Hobbit trilogy, "An Unexpected Journey" tells the tale of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who lives a simple life in the shire until the wizard Gandalf convinces him to join a quest to reclaim the Lonely Mountain from the fearsome dragon Smaug. The epic journey takes Bilbo on a path through treacherous lands swarming with dangers, not least of which is an encounter with Gollum and a simple gold ring that is tied to the fate of Middle Earth in ways Bilbo cannot even fathom.
titles.shortDescription: Bilbo Baggins departs on a quest to reclaim the Lonely Mountain: a gripping journey through treacherous lands fraught with danger.

titles.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
titles.description: Terror is what awaits everyone at Hogwarts this year. Overlooking the warnings to not return to School, Harry reaches there only to find mysterious attacks and haunting voices that speak only to him. The peculiar words carved on the wall proclaim: "The Chamber of Secrets Has Been Opened. Enemies of the Heir, Beware." In an attempt to solve this and to rescue Ron's sister; Harry, Ron, and Hermione fight with all they have, to the extent of putting their own lives in danger.
titles.shortDescription: Terror is what awaits everyone at Hogwarts this year. Harry reaches there only to find mysterious attacks and haunting voices. To solve this: Harry, Ron, and Hermione fight with all they have, to the extent of putting their own lives in danger.

titleLocalized.en: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

titles.title: ROCKY V
titles.description: Retired from boxing due to his medical test results that showed irreversible brain damage, Rocky loses everything because of his accountant's mismanagement. To have it all back, he plans to re-enter the boxing world by coaching a fiery young boxer named Tommy, and take back what was snatched from him, while all the way trying to mend a deteriorating relationship with his son. Will he be able to get it all back?
titles.shortDescription: Retired from boxing, Rocky loses everything because of his accountant's mismanagement. To have it all back, he plans to re-enter the boxing world by coaching a fiery young boxer named Tommy, and take back what was snatched from him.

titles.title: Final Destination
titles.description: Just when Alex, a high school student is about to leave for Paris, he has a strong premonition that the plane is going to explode and everyone within it will fall victim to the crash. He insists everyone to get off the plane and seven people, including Alex, are forced to disembark the doomed plane. They all watch as the plane blasts into a fireball just after leaving the ground. All the survivors have cheated death, but will they be able to do it for long?
titles.shortDescription: Just when Alex, along with his fellow club members, is about to board the plane, he has a premonition that the plane is going to explode. He saves his friends from dying. All the survivors have cheated death, but will they be able to do it for long?

titles.title: Rush Hour 2
titles.description: Los Angeles Police Department detective, James Carter, and Hong Kong Police inspector, Lee, while on a vacation together to Hong Kong, find themselves in the middle of yet another case. As they try to search for the mastermind behind a bomb explosion in the American embassy that murdered two U.S. custom agents, they first have to go through one of the most powerful Triad gangsters in Asia, Ricky Tan.
titles.shortDescription: James Carter and Lee find themselves in the middle of yet another case. As they try to search for the mastermind behind an explosion at the U.S. embassy, they first have to go through one of the most powerful Triad gangsters in Asia, Ricky Tan.

titles.title: Final Destination 2
titles.description: Kimberly Corman has a horrible premonition of a highway accident in which several cars crash by hitting a logging truck resulting into multiple casualties. In a rush of adrenaline, she blocks the traffic behind her, thereby saving her friends from a terrible fate. The survivors have cheated death. Now death is stalking them and mysteriously, one by one, they start dying the way they were meant to.
titles.shortDescription: Kimberly has a horrible premonition of a highway accident in which several cars crash by hitting a logging truck. In a rush of adrenaline, she blocks the traffic behind her. The survivors have cheated death and now death is stalking them.

titles.title: ROCKY III
titles.description: After earning the title of the world heavyweight champion and becoming rich and famous beyond his imagination, Rocky Balboa loses it all due to his pride and sluggishness. Even his title gets stolen by a young thug named Clubber Lang. To earn it all back, he seeks the help of his former rival, Apollo Creed, to get back into practice and show the world that he is still the world's best heavy-weight champion by defeating Clubber in a match.
titles.shortDescription: After becoming the world heavyweight champion and getting rich and famous beyond imagination, Rocky loses it all due to his pride and laziness. He seeks the help of his former rival to show the world that he is still the world's best champion.

titles.title: Final Destination 5
titles.description: Sam, during a bus ride with his colleagues, has a horrifying premonition that the bridge they are crossing will collapse underneath them. Soon after that, the bridge starts to crumble. But he is able to save a few lucky (or unlucky) souls, including his girlfriend and best friend. However, death is not to be cheated! It takes what it wants. How long will they be able to escape their fate? Will they be able to escape their fate?
titles.shortDescription: Sam, during a bus ride, has a premonition that the bridge they are crossing will collapse underneath them. Soon after, the bridge starts to crumble. But he is able to save a few lucky (or unlucky) souls. However, death is not to be cheated!

titles.title: Karma
titles.description: The story of a hunter who comes out from the waving waters of the sea at dawn and arrives at a strange lagoon. While he was daydreaming, a creature attacks him and takes him back to the waters. The movie emphasizes on the nature's cycle and transformation of elements and nature's four basic elements.
titles.shortDescription: The story of a hunter who comes out from the waving waters of the sea and arrives at a strange lagoon. While he was daydreaming, a creature attacks him and takes him back to the waters.

titles.title: Zehr
titles.description: A short film about how Tobacco is injurious to health.
titles.shortDescription: A short film about how Tobacco is injurious to health.

titles.title: Mute
titles.description: Monette, a middle-aged salesman, picks up a deaf/mute hitchhiker on the road. The hitchhiker falls asleep and Monette vents his problems, knowing they fall on deaf ears. He rants about his wife’s infidelity and her embezzlement. Monette thinks nothing of this encounter until two days later when his wife and her lover are found murdered.
titles.shortDescription: Monette picks up a deaf/mute hitchhiker on the road. The hitchhiker falls asleep and Monette vents his problems, knowing they fall on deaf ears. Monette thinks nothing of this encounter until two days later when his wife and her lover are found murdered.

titles.title: Tumhari Pam Pam
titles.description: In 1980’s, Pakistani lovers used to communicate through love letters. Mirza, being good with words, drafts those letters for money. He himself becomes the victim of words when one fine day, an anonymous letter comes through his door and then the train of letters begins.
titles.shortDescription: In 1980’s, Pakistani lovers used to communicate through love letters. Mirza, being good with words, drafts those letters for money. He himself becomes the victim of words when one fine day, an anonymous letter comes through his door.

titles.title: Just A Cup Of Tea
titles.description: Tea is the one thing that everyone loves but can it be so special to someone that he can wait for just that special cup for years. A narrative journey of Ghulam Raees who takes us back in time where he used to work at the tea store of Ahmedeen and they both used to enjoy tea together. Who made that special tea and why was it so special to both the characters is the story that unfolds with beautiful visuals and engaging music of Bas Ek Piyali Chai.
titles.shortDescription: Tea is the one thing that everyone loves but can it be so special to someone that he can wait for just that special cup for years. A narrative journey of Ghulam Raees who takes us back in time where he used to work at the tea store of Ahmedeen and they both used to enjoy tea together.

titles.title: Kam Di Gal
titles.description: It is a portrayal of the fact that no matter what the education, class, age, socioeconomic status or IQ of a person is, he can give you a good piece of advice or tell you something of great value. So we should pay attention when somebody tries to tell us something important regardless of his apparent personality.
titles.shortDescription: It is a portrayal of the fact that no matter what the education, class, age, socioeconomic status or IQ of a person is, he can give you a good piece of advice or tell you something of great value. So we should pay attention when somebody tries to tell us something important.

As he travels in search for answers, his life unfolds in front of him in ways he had never imagined. Based on a planet far far away, Machinepur is a ride to unexplored territories of our hearts.

An unexpected delay in the train sparks an unlikely relationship between the two, serving as a coming-of-age moment while they bond through the basic human traits of panic, depression and most importantly joy.

Unfortunately, the free-spirited girl has no intention of marrying him and pulls every trick in the book to get out of the arranged marriage. However, as circumstance brings them closer together, Tanu begins to relent.

Munna Bhai swears to redeem himself by obtaining an M.B.B.S. degree, and with the help of his right-hand man Circuit, he gains admission to the college. While his medical skills are minimal, his compassion transforms those around him.

Wilson attempts to take Sultan down through the gang leader's relationship with a Bollywood actress, but his attempt fails. Then a rising gangster, Shoaib Khan, overthrows Sultan � but the power struggle is far from over.
titles.shortDescription: As a smuggler (Ajay Devgn) rises to power in 1970s Mumbai, a younger gangster (Emraan Hashmi) seeks to overthrow him.

titleLocalized.en: Once Upon A Time In Mumbai

titles.title: 3 Idiots
titles.description: During college, Farhan and Raju form an unshakeable friendship with Rancho, an entertaining guy with a refreshing outlook on life. Many years later, Farhan and Raju have lost touch with Rancho and are desperate to track him down. Suddenly, a bet gives them the opportunity to look for their long-lost and elusive friend. Can they find Rancho?
titles.shortDescription: Indian coming-of-age comedy-drama inspired by the novel, Five Point Someone by Chetan Bhagat.

titles.description: When politically motivated thugs kidnap and plan to murder an up-and-coming movie star, trigger-happy politician Alka Singh AKA Revolver Rani leaps into action to save the day.

He must now enlist the aid of his trusty friend Circuit to get his love life back on track. Just when he thinks he's got his problem worked out, the arrival of a figure from history finds Munna facing an unusual case of the past catching up with the present.
titles.shortDescription: Mumbai goon Munnabhai (Sanjay Dutt) and his loyal pal Circuit (Arshad Warsi) are back in this blockbuster comedy sequel to the popular hit ,Munnabhai MBBS.

After asking her parents, permission, she decides to take her honeymoon trip anyway, on her own. However, as she Rani enjoys her European adventure, making new friends along the way, she is surprised to see a familiar face waiting for her in Paris.

While awaiting help, they take shelter in a house owned by Shashi, a mysterious woman with mesmerizing looks. Distracted by her beauty, the friends find themselves trapped, and escape is no longer an option.
titles.shortDescription: A seductive witch (Preeti Soni) kills men by casting a spell on them.

titles.title: Life Partner
titles.description: Experienced Cape Town divorce attorney Jeet Oberoi warns his friends, Karan Malhotra and Bhavesh Patel, about the many disadvantages of being married. Ignoring Jeet's advice, Karan marries his girlfriend Sanjana Jugran, while Bhavesh travels to Gujarat, along with his entire family, to marry the very liberal Prachi Jadeja. Experienced Cape Town divorce attorney Jeet Oberoi warns his friends, Karan Malhotra and Bhavesh Patel, about the many disadvantages of being married. Ignoring Jeet's advice, Karan marries his girlfriend Sanjana Jugran, while Bhavesh travels to Gujarat � along with his entire family � to marry the very liberal Prachi Jadeja. Find out what happens next.
titles.shortDescription: An experienced divorce attorney (Govinda) tries to warn his friends about the pitfalls of marriage before they tie the knot.

As a masked villain unleashes other monsters using monster machine re-creating classic Mystery Inc. foes like The Pterodactyl Ghost, The Black Knight, and The 10,000 Volt Ghost, the gang also has to deal with a TV journalist, Heather Jasper-Howe, who is hell-bent on discrediting their detective abilities!
titles.shortDescription: Scooby-Doo, Shaggy, Velma, Fred, and Daphne join together to solve another mystery. As a masked villain unleashes other monsters, the gang also has to deal with a TV journalist who is hell-bent on discrediting their detective abilities!

He is unaware of the adventures that await him there as he develops a bond of friendship with James Hook and Tiger Lily and becomes their bravest warrior. However, they must work together in order to save Neverland from clutches of a cold-blooded pirate Blackbeard.

So while others croon in the mating season, he starts his amazing tap-dance. Will he be able to tap-dance his way into the heart of the one he loves, who wishes to hear a song from him? And will Mumble be able to save his colony from the invasion of aliens through his tap-dance?
titles.shortDescription: Unlike other penguins of his colony, Mumble cannot sing to attract his soul mate. His talent is dancing. So while others croon, he starts his amazing tap-dance. Will he be able to tap-dance his way into the heart of the one he loves?

When his gang heads to Earth to kidnap Bugs Bunny and the Looney Tunes, Bugs challenges them to a basketball game to determine their fate. The aliens agree, but they steal the powers of NBA basketball players, including Larry Bird and Charles Barkley – so Bugs gets some help from superstar Michael Jordan.
titles.shortDescription: An amusement park owner (Danny DeVito) decides the Looney Tunes would be the perfect attraction – whether they like it or not. Can they win their freedom?

To console her, her aunt tells her a story of a young girl whose dream was to become a world-famous ice skater. However, Jess soon learns the power of true friendship when she befriends an enchanted reindeer named Blizzard from the North Pole.

For that purpose, he is recruited by a group of strangers that include a LEGO Batman and an old mystic, to stop the plans of an evil tyrant of conquering the world. Together with his fellows, he sets out on an epic expedition for which he is hopelessly and amusingly unprepared!

Finding himself more comfortable with a lion than a lady, Griffin decides the only way to get a girl in his life is to leave the zoo and find a more glamorous job. The animals, in a panic, decide to break their time-honored code of silence and reveal their biggest secret: they can talk! To keep Griffin from leaving, they decide to teach him the rules of courtship - animal style.
titles.shortDescription: The animals at a zoo decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper (Kevin James) gain the attention of one particular woman.

After her best friend disappears, with the help of her daemon, a tribe of seafarers, a witch, an ice bear, and a Texas airman, she sets out to the far North on a mission to rescue not only her best friend from the mysterious organization and save her own world but our world as well.
titles.shortDescription: Lyra resides in an alternate world where part of the soul lives outside the human body as a companion known as daemons. After her best friend disappears, she sets out on a mission to rescue not only him and save her own world but ours as well.

But due to his older brother's wicked notions, they both fall victim directly into the talons of the evil Pure Ones. Planning a daring escape from the clutches of the Pure Ones, Soren along with the other young and brave owls sets out to seek the legendary Guardians to save the owl kingdom.

titles.description: The Undisputed King is a short film about intuition and why following it is so important. The video revolves around one character who encounters his “intuition” as it’s trying to speak to him in his own avatar. He then has a one on one conversation with his intuition which leads him to a realization that his passion has to be the driving force, and how he can change his life by pursuing what he loves and adores the most.

titles.title: ARMY OF DARKNESS
titles.description: A man named Ash accidentally travels back in time to the medieval ages through a mysterious book. In an attempt to get back to his time, he inadvertently awakens and unleashes the army of the dead with the same book. However, he soon realizes that he is the kingdom's only hope in battling the army. Will he be able to defeat them and go back to where he arrived from?
titles.shortDescription: A man accidentally travels back in time to the medieval ages through a mysterious book. In an attempt to get back, he inadvertently awakens the army of the dead. However, he soon realizes that he is the kingdom's only hope in battling the army.

titles.title: Exorcist: The Version You've Never Seen
titles.description: Regan, a young teenage girl, starts acting weird and speaking in different tongues all of a sudden. Her mother, concerned by her daughter's behavior, sets out to seek medical help. After hitting a blind alley with doctors, in order to save her daughter, she reaches out to the local priests who believe in performing an exorcism as the only way. Hence, an expert is sent by the church to help with this difficult task.

titles.title: House of Wax
titles.description: On their way to the biggest college football championship of the year, a gang of unfortunate college friends is knocked off course when they find out that their vehicle has been deliberately tampered with. The group soon finds a dark secret of Ambrose's main attraction, Trudy's House of Wax, which is filled with truly life-like wax sculptures. They must now strive to prevent themselves from falling victim to a pair of insane murderous brothers in a small town of Ambrose.
titles.shortDescription: A gang of college friends is knocked off course near a strange wax museum. They must now strive to prevent themselves from falling victim to a pair of insane murderous brothers in a small town of Ambrose.

titles.title: The Reaping
titles.description: Ever since her family was tragically murdered, Katherine Morrissey, a former Christian missionary loses her faith in God and becomes an expert in refuting religious occurrences. This is why she plans to visit Louisiana which seems to be going through a series of biblical outbreaks, to prove that it has nothing to do with anything supernatural, rather it can be justified scientifically. But she soon realizes that she has to regain her belief in order to fight the evil that is lurking in town.
titles.shortDescription: Ever since her family was tragically murdered, Katherine loses her faith in God and becomes an expert in refuting religious occurrences. But when she visits Louisiana, she has to regain her belief in order to fight the evil that is lurking in town.

titles.title: POLTERGEIST II: THE OTHER SIDE
titles.description: The Freeling family leave their haunted house and move to a new one. But, unfortunately, supernatural forces do not leave them alone anywhere. Taylor, a paranormal investigator, goes off to warn them that their young daughter is still in danger because the beast, who was posing to be the Rev. Kane, knows their whereabouts. In order to protect her, the family must join heads together and use their wits to defeat the beast.
titles.shortDescription: The Freelings leave their haunted house and move to a new one. Taylor warns them that their daughter is still in danger because the beast knows their whereabouts. The family must now join heads together and use their wits to defeat the beast.

titles.title: Nothing but Trouble
titles.description: Chris Thorne, a wealthy businessman, in his attempts to seduce an attractive lawyer, Diane Lightson, agrees to give her a ride to the Atlantic City, N.J. But his reckless driving catches the attention of a cop and lands him and all those who tagged along with him in court, where they come face to face with a barbarous judge, who has a thing against wealthy and rich people.
titles.shortDescription: Chris Thorne, a wealthy businessman, in his attempts to seduce an attractive lawyer agrees to give her a ride. But his reckless driving catches the attention of a cop and lands him and all those who tagged along with him in court.

titles.title: LORD OF ILLUSIONS
titles.description: Harry D'Amour, a private investigator, comes across a case involving a woman named Dorothea Swann, who informs him that she and her husband, an illusionist, are being chased by a religious cult of people for killing their leader named Nix 13 years ago, who the cult is trying to resurrect. She asks him to protect them against the evil cult members. However, her husband is killed and soon Dorothea and D'Amour are to become the next victims.
titles.shortDescription: A private investigator comes across a case involving a woman and her husband who are being chased by a religious cult of people and is tasked with protecting them from the cult. Will he be able to do that or will he himself become their next victim?

titles.title: Species
titles.description: When government scientist Xavier Fitch intercepts a space transmission containing the genetic sequence for an alien life form, he uses it to produce "Sil" - a gorgeous alien-human hybrid. As Fitch's team grows concerned at her rapid rate of growth, Sil wrecks the laboratory and begins a violent quest for a suitable male human to impregnate her. The US government dispatches top assassin Preston Lennox and a team of experts to stop her.
titles.shortDescription: A government scientist (Ben Kingsley) creates a gorgeous alien-human hybrid with devastating consequences for the human race.

titles.title: Red Riding Hood
titles.description: Much to her family's discontent, young Valerie falls for an orphaned woodcutter, Peter. Her parents, on the other hand, want her to marry wealthy Henry. Just when Valerie and Peter are on the verge of putting their plan of running away into action, Valerie's sister gets killed by a werewolf. The villagers reach out to Father Solomon for help who warns them that werewolf takes the shape of a human during the day. As the killings continue, Valerie reckons that it is someone she knows very well.
titles.shortDescription: Young Valerie falls for an orphaned woodcutter, Peter. Just when Valerie and Peter are on the verge of putting their plan of running away into action, Valerie's sister gets killed by a werewolf. The villagers reach out to Father Solomon for help.

titles.title: The Beast Within
titles.description: A young newly married couple gets into car trouble while driving near a small Mississippi town. As they search for help, Caroline gets raped by a mysterious creature and she soon gets pregnant. When their child named Michael grows into a teenager, unexplainable visible changes start occurring to him. He returns to Mississippi for answers while his parents struggle to understand the changes their son is going through.
titles.shortDescription: A young couple gets into car trouble while driving near a small town. As they search for help, Caroline gets raped by a mysterious creature and gets pregnant. When their child grows into a teenager, unexplainable changes start occurring to him.

titles.title: Annabelle
titles.description: A horror spin-off movie from the universe of The Conjuring and The Nun. If you have fear of dolls, Annabelle will only make it worse. You've been warned!
titles.shortDescription: A horror spin-off movie from the universe of The Conjuring and The Nun. If you have fear of dolls, Annabelle will only make it worse. You've been warned!

titles.title: One Missed Call
titles.description: Beth Raymond witnesses the deaths of two of her friends after they receive an anonymous voice call in which they hear their own horrifying final moments before death takes them. Soon several people start receiving the same terrifying voice-mails.
