After Beth receives her own phone call, she knows she has only three days to crack this mystery and save herself from a nasty fate. But will she be able to do that in time before death comes for her too?
titles.shortDescription: Beth Raymond witnesses the deaths of two of her friends after they receive an anonymous voice call. After Beth receives her own phone call, she knows she has only three days to crack this mystery and save herself from a nasty fate!

titles.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
titles.description: A group of four friends goes out on one last road trip before one of them is sent to serve in Vietnam. Harassed by the bikers along the way, they get in an accident. A stranger arrives who, after killing one of the bikers, takes them to the Hewitt homestead: A place where terror awaits them in the form of a chainsaw-wielding killer.
titles.shortDescription: A group of friends goes on one last road trip before one of them is sent to Vietnam. Harassed by the bikers along the way, a man arrives who, after killing one of the bikers, takes them to the Hewitt homestead: A place where terror awaits them all.

titleLocalized.en: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning

titles.title: Final Destination 5
titles.description: Sam, during a bus ride with his colleagues, has a horrifying premonition that the bridge they are crossing will collapse underneath them. Soon after that, the bridge starts to crumble. But he is able to save a few lucky (or unlucky) souls, including his girlfriend and best friend. However, death is not to be cheated! It takes what it wants. How long will they be able to escape their fate? Will they be able to escape their fate?
titles.shortDescription: Sam, during a bus ride, has a premonition that the bridge they are crossing will collapse underneath them. Soon after, the bridge starts to crumble. But he is able to save a few lucky (or unlucky) souls. However, death is not to be cheated!

titles.title: Final Destination
titles.description: Just when Alex, a high school student is about to leave for Paris, he has a strong premonition that the plane is going to explode and everyone within it will fall victim to the crash. He insists everyone to get off the plane and seven people, including Alex, are forced to disembark the doomed plane. They all watch as the plane blasts into a fireball just after leaving the ground. All the survivors have cheated death, but will they be able to do it for long?
titles.shortDescription: Just when Alex, along with his fellow club members, is about to board the plane, he has a premonition that the plane is going to explode. He saves his friends from dying. All the survivors have cheated death, but will they be able to do it for long?

titles.title: The Amityville Horror
titles.description: When the newlyweds move into a new house where a murder took place several years ago, the couple soon begins to experience peculiar events which leads them to believe that the house is haunted. Hence, they call on a priest to rid the house of the evil spirits.
titles.shortDescription: When a couple moves into a new house where a murder took place several years ago, they soon begin to experience peculiar events which lead them to believe that the house is haunted. Hence, they call on a priest to rid the house of the spirits.

titles.title: POLTERGEIST III
titles.description: Carol Anne is sent to reside with her uncle named Bruce and aunt named Pat in Chicago. But the evil that had haunted her in the past does not intend to leave her alone anywhere. When Carol stars undergoing paranormal activities, she is sent to have therapy sessions with the doctor who does not believe a word she is telling him. However, her terrors are only heightened when she starts seeing the ghosts more often and realizes that she has to deal with her fears alone.
titles.shortDescription: Carol is sent to live with her uncle and aunt. But the evil that had haunted her in the past does not leave her alone anywhere. Her terrors are only heightened when she starts seeing the ghosts and realizes that she has to deal with her fears alone.

titles.title: Freddy Vs. Jason
titles.description: Serial killer Freddy Krueger, who attacks his victims in their dreams, teams up with a fierce murderer Jason Voorhees when he learns that citizens of the town have become less frightened of him. Together they begin a violent killing spree. But when Freddy finds out that Jason is murdering his intended targets, he becomes all too furious and the two start battling each other instead.
titles.shortDescription: Freddy Krueger, who attacks his victims in their dreams, teams up with a fierce murderer Jason Voorhees. Together they begin a killing spree. But when Freddy finds out that Jason is murdering his intended targets, the two start battling each other.

titles.title: Final Destination 2
titles.description: Kimberly Corman has a horrible premonition of a highway accident in which several cars crash by hitting a logging truck resulting into multiple casualties. In a rush of adrenaline, she blocks the traffic behind her, thereby saving her friends from a terrible fate. The survivors have cheated death. Now death is stalking them and mysteriously, one by one, they start dying the way they were meant to.
titles.shortDescription: Kimberly has a horrible premonition of a highway accident in which several cars crash by hitting a logging truck. In a rush of adrenaline, she blocks the traffic behind her. The survivors have cheated death and now death is stalking them.

titles.title: Final Destination 3
titles.description: Wendy, a high-school student, goes to an amusement park with a group of friends. They decide to take a roller coaster ride. However, Wendy has a sudden strong premonition that something will go wrong and they will not be able to make it till the end of the ride. She manages to save a few people along with her and they watch as everyone on the roller coaster dies. They weren't supposed to escape their fate, which is why the grim reaper sets out to take those it was meant to take with it!
titles.shortDescription: Wendy goes to an amusement park with her friends. They decide to ride on a roller coaster. However, Wendy has a premonition that something will go wrong. She saves a few people but death sets out to collect those it was meant to take with it!

titles.title: The Final Destination
titles.description: Nick O'Bannon, while out with his friends at the track, has a ghastly premonition that he and his friends are going to die in a deadly car race. He manages to save them mere seconds before his horrific vision comes to life. Despite the fact that they have cheated death, death will not stop until it gets what it wants! The reaper will keep lurking around them until it makes sure that each of them has met the end that they were supposed to.
titles.shortDescription: Nick O'Bannon, has a ghastly premonition that he and his friends are going to die in a deadly car race. He manages to save them mere seconds before his horrific vision comes to life but death will not stop until it gets what it wants!

titles.title: Batman And Robin
titles.description: Batman and his partner, Robin, team up to defeat a new deranged gang of super-villains. Amongst them, the most dangerous ones are Mr. Freeze, who likes to turn everyone and everything into snow and plans to turn Gotham City into an arctic region, and Poison Ivy, a woman who targets her victims by poisoning them. As the two heroes fight against these villains, they are joined by a third hero, the Batgirl.
titles.shortDescription: Batman and Robin team up to defeat a deranged gang of super-villains. Amongst them, the most dangerous ones are Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy. As the two heroes fight against these villains, they are joined by a third hero, the Batgirl.

titles.title: The Dark Knight
titles.description: Batman has been able to keep the crime in Gotham City in control. The emergence of a young criminal, Joker, wreaks havoc among the citizens of the city. To fight injustice, the Dark Knight must prepare himself for an epic battle of his life.
titles.shortDescription: Batman has been able to keep the crime in Gotham City in control. The emergence of a young criminal, Joker, wreaks havoc among the citizens of the city. To fight injustice, the Dark Knight must prepare himself for an epic battle of his life.

titles.title: Beowulf
titles.description: Beowulf, a brave warrior, offers King Hrothgar to rid his kingdom of the vicious troll-like beast called Grendel that interrupts their celebrations every time. After successfully slaying the beast, he is awarded a golden drinking horn by the king. Little does Beowulf know that he has incurred the wrath of a vicious creature, Grendel's mother, who can transform into as beautiful a woman as she can be vengeful! Soon she begins killing everyone out of vengeance.
titles.shortDescription: Beowulf offers the King to rid his kingdom of the vicious beast, Grendel. He successfully slays it but is unaware that he has incurred the wrath of Grendel's mother who is vengeful and seductive. Soon she begins killing everyone out of vengeance.

titles.title: Constantine
titles.description: John Constantine, a demon hunter and a suicide survivor, with an extraordinary gift helps a police woman, Angela Dodson, investigate the suicide of her twin sister. John Constantine, having literally been to hell and back, is aware that when he dies, he will go to the underworld with no chance of moving to heaven unless he does enough good deeds in this world. In order to prove to her that her sister's death was not merely a suicide but something more, he gets caught up in a world of demons.
titles.shortDescription: John Constantine, a demon hunter, with an extraordinary gift helps a police woman investigate the suicide of her twin sister. To prove to her that her sister's death was not merely a suicide but something more, he gets caught up in a world of demons.

titles.title: Legends of Tomorrow
titles.description: Superhero series based on the DC Comic characters. Having seeing what doom the future holds, Rip Hunter desperately tries to prevent certain events from happening by time-traveling. Realizing that heroes alone are not enough – the world needs legends – Rip assembles a desperate group of both heroes and villains to confront an impending catastrophe that threatens not just the planet, but time itself.
titles.shortDescription: Superhero series based on the DC Comic characters. Time-traveler Rip Hunter realizes that to prevent an impending catastrophe, heroes are not enough – the world needs legends.

titles.title: Batman Begins
titles.description: Bruce Wayne travels to the far-east after the death of his parents, where he is trained in martial arts by Henri Ducard, a member of the dangerous but honorable cult. After destruction hits Gotham City, Wayne returns with the intention of wiping the city clean of all the filth that has taken over it. With the help of his faithful butler, Alfred, and a tech expert, Lucius Fox, Batman comes into existence and begins its mission!
titles.shortDescription: Bruce Wayne travels to the far east, where he is trained in martial arts by a member of the dangerous but honorable cult. After destruction hits Gotham City, Wayne returns, as Batman, to wipe the city clean of all the filth that has taken over it.

titles.title: Catwoman
titles.description: Patience Philips works at Hedare Beauty, a huge cosmetics company that is about to release a ground-breaking anti-aging invention, as a graphic designer. Sensitive and insecure of everything, she always keeps apologizing for everything, until one day she is killed and then reborn. That is when Patience's entire life takes on a new turn as she is blessed with supernatural speed, inhuman reflexes, and cat-like sharp senses.
titles.shortDescription: Patience Philips is a sensitive and insecure ordinary woman. Her life takes on a new turn when she is killed and then reborn, as she is blessed with supernatural speed, inhuman reflexes, and cat-like sharp senses.

titles.title: Pan
titles.description: Peter, a 12-year old orphan, lives in an orphanage in London until he is abducted away into the magical world of Neverland. He is unaware of the adventures that await him there as he develops a bond of friendship with James Hook and Tiger Lily and becomes their bravest warrior. However, they must work together in order to save Neverland from clutches of a cold-blooded pirate Blackbeard.
titles.shortDescription: Peter, a 12-year old orphan, lives in an orphanage in London until he is abducted into the magical world of Neverland. He befriends James Hook and Tiger Lily. The three must work together to save Neverland from a cold-blooded pirate Blackbeard.

titles.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
titles.description: Johnny Blaze is struggling with the curse of being the devil's bounty hunter, the Ghost Rider. In order to rid himself of the curse, he is asked by a priest named Moreau to find a boy named Danny and save him from the devil. However, getting to him won't be easy as the devil himself is also looking for him. Will Johnny be able to get to the boy and save him before the devil finds him? Will he be able to rid himself of the curse once and for all?
titles.shortDescription: Johnny is struggling with the curse of being the Ghost Rider. To rid himself of the curse, he is asked by a priest to find a young boy and save him from the devil. However, getting to him won't be easy as the devil himself is also looking for him.

titles.title: Superman Returns
titles.description: Returning to earth after five years, Superman learns that the world as he left it has changed. Louis Lane, his love interest has moved on with her life and now has a son. Lex Luther, in an attempt to destroy Superman once and for all, is plotting against him and experimenting with Kryptonite. Superman has to struggle in order to make his place in the life of Louis, who no longer loves him, and this world that no longer needs him.
titles.shortDescription: Returning to earth after five years, Superman learns that the world as he left it has changed and Louis Lane has moved on with her life. Lex Luther, in an attempt to destroy Superman, is plotting against him and experimenting with Kryptonite.

titles.title: Batman Returns
titles.description: An evil businessman Max Shreck and a grisly Penguin, who resides in the sewers under the city, team up to take over Gotham City. As they spread terror and fear in the citizens, it is only up to the Batman to stop them once and for all. Meanwhile, a cat-woman, who was almost killed by Shreck, also joins their agenda of defeating Batman but when she comes face to face with him, unexpected feelings emerge.
titles.shortDescription: An evil businessman Max Shreck and a grisly Penguin team up to take over Gotham City. As they spread terror in the citizens, it is only up to the Batman to stop them. Meanwhile, a cat-woman also joins forces with them to defeat the Batman.

titles.title: Batman Forever
titles.description: Batman has to face two villains: district attorney Harvey Dent now known as Two-Face and Wayne Enterprises employee Edward Nygma, now known as The Riddler who seeks revenge against his previous employer for firing him. The two villains join forces to drain the minds of the residents of Gotham City and to defeat Batman. Batman gets help from a circus performer Dick Grayson who seeks vengeance against Two-Face for murdering his parents.
titles.shortDescription: Batman has to face two villains who team up to drain the minds of the City's residents and to defeat Batman. With the help of a circus performer who seeks vengeance against Two-Face for murdering his parents, Batman sets out to defeat the villains.

titles.title: Supergirl
titles.description: Twelve year-old Kara escaped the doomed planet Krypton at the same time as her infant cousin Kal-El – AKA Superman – but didn't arrive on Earth until many years later. Raised by an adoptive family, Kara spent so many years trying to fit in that she forgot to ever stand out. All that changes when she decides to embrace her superhuman abilities and become the hero she was always destined to be. With the help of her friends and the super-secret Department of Extra-Normal Operations, Kara – now known as Supergirl – takes to the skies to protect her world.
titles.shortDescription: After years of keeping her powers secret, Superman's cousin – Kara Zor-El – finally embraces her superhuman abilities to become the hero she was always meant to be.

titles.title: Godzilla
titles.description: Not long after he is reunited with his family that Ford Brody is persuaded by his father, Joe, to move to Japan to help him. They are both caught up in a battle as Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to kill two malicious monstrous creatures that threaten to destroy the human world. Humans stand defenseless watching the combat as the incredible creature strives to reinstate balance and harmony, leaving a trail of destruction in its way.
titles.shortDescription: Ford Brody is persuaded by his father, Joe, to move to Japan to help him. They are both caught up in a battle as Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to kill two malicious monstrous creatures that threaten to destroy the human world.

titles.title: The Avengers
titles.description: When the weather seems out of control in England, John Steed is called in to investigate the strange happenings which feel like someone is controlling the weather. All evidence points to Sir August de Wynter. Hence, two secret agents, John Steed and Emma Peel, set out on a quest to stop the evil genius who has learned a way to control the weather and now intends to use it as a weapon of destruction against the entire world by enforcing blizzards and other extreme weathers.
titles.shortDescription: Two secret agents set out on a quest to stop an evil genius, Sir August de Wynter, who learns a way to control the weather and now intends to use it as a weapon of destruction against the entire world by enforcing blizzards and other extreme weathers.

titles.title: Spawn
titles.description: Al Simmons, an assassin, who is betrayed and murdered by his boss, is given a chance to return to earth provided he leads an evil army. He agrees and is reincarnated as a burnt, scarred Hellspawn. However, upon arrival, he starts serving the forces of good despite his temptations to return to his prior life.
titles.shortDescription: Al Simmons, an assassin, who is betrayed and murdered by his boss, is given a chance to return to earth provided he leads an evil army. He agrees and is reincarnated as a Hellspawn. However, upon arrival, he starts serving the forces of good.

titles.title: The Flash
titles.description: After being struck by dark matter lightning in his lab, forensic scientist Barry Allen develops the ability to move at superhuman speed. Barry discovers that many other people were affected by the event – most of whom are using their newfound powers for evil. Determined to be a force for good, Barry becomes ‘The Flash’, and dedicates his life to fighting these threats. However, secret forces are determined to manipulate him for their own agenda.
titles.shortDescription: After being struck by dark matter lightning, a forensic scientist uses his new powers of super speed to become a superhero – The Flash.

titles.title: The Golden Compass
titles.description: Lyra Belacqua resides in an alternate world where part of the soul lives outside the human body as a companion known as daemons. After her best friend disappears, with the help of her daemon, a tribe of seafarers, a witch, an ice bear, and a Texas airman, she sets out to the far North on a mission to rescue not only her best friend from the mysterious organization and save her own world but our world as well.
titles.shortDescription: Lyra resides in an alternate world where part of the soul lives outside the human body as a companion known as daemons. After her best friend disappears, she sets out on a mission to rescue not only him and save her own world but ours as well.

titles.title: The Dark Knight Rises
titles.description: With the apparition of a mysterious cunning cat burglar in Gotham City and a ruthless masked terrorist named Bane beginning an agenda of massive destruction, Batman is forced to return from his exile after eight years to save the city. However, Batman is only indulging himself in a battle that he may not be able to win against Bane.
titles.shortDescription: When a cunning cat-woman and a brutal terrorist, Bane, start an agenda of massive destruction in Gotham City, Batman is forced to return from his exile. However, Batman is only indulging himself in a battle that he may not be able to win

titles.title: Arrow
titles.description: A billionaire playboy, Oliver Queen, presumed dead by everyone, was stranded on an island for five years. He returns home with just one goal in mind, to protect his city from the criminals. In the eyes of citizens, he is a wealthy business tycoon, but secretly, he battles crimes and punishes criminals as a vigilante known by the name of Hood.
titles.shortDescription: A billionaire playboy presumed dead by everyone, returns home after five years, with just one goal in mind, to protect his city from the criminals. In the eyes of citizens, he is a wealthy businessman, but secretly, he battles crimes as a vigilante.

titles.title: A View to a Kill
titles.description: Agent 007 is sent to stop a sinister megalomaniac tycoon named Max Zorin, who plans to eliminate its competitor, Silicon Valley, by causing massive destruction, to create its worldwide microchip monopoly. Bond partners up with Sir Godfrey Tibbet and sexy geologist Stacey Sutton to thwart their villainous scheme.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 is sent to stop a sinister tycoon from eliminating its competitor by causing massive destruction, to create its worldwide monopoly. Bond partners up with Sir Godfrey Tibbet and sexy geologist Stacey Sutton to thwart their villainous scheme.

titles.title: Casino Royale
titles.description: After being armed with a license to kill, Agent 007 partners up with Vesper Lynd and together they head off to Madagascar on a mission to defeat Le Chiffre, a man who finances terrorist organizations, in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.
titles.shortDescription: After being armed with a license to kill, Agent 007 heads off to Madagascar on a mission to defeat Le Chiffre, a man who finances terrorist organizations, in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

titles.title: Tomorrow Never Dies
titles.description: Agent 007 heads off to China and partners up with Chinese secret agent Wai Lin to stop a wealthy tycoon named Elliot Carver who intends to start a war between the Western world and China, when the Chinese government refused to let him broadcast his news empire in their country.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 heads off to China to stop a wealthy tycoon named Elliot Carver who intends to start a war between the Western world and China, when the Chinese government refused to let him broadcast his news empire in their country.

titles.title: The Spy Who Loved Me
titles.description: Agent 007 teams up with sexy Russian agent named Anya Amasova to prevent yet another evil tycoon, Karl Stromberg, from destroying New York City with nuclear weapons. Evading all the obstacles in his way, his most lethal opponent, in this case, is a seven-foot giant named Jaws, with terrifying steel teeth.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 teams up with sexy Russian agent to prevent an evil tycoon, Karl Stromberg, from destroying New York City with nuclear weapons. In this case, his most lethal opponent is a seven-foot giant with terrifying steel teeth.

titles.title: Diamonds Are Forever
titles.description: After looking into the peculiar activities taking place in the diamond market, Agent 007 travels to Las Vegas and joins forces with the beautiful smuggler Tiffany Case, to stop a wealthy business tycoon, Blofeld, who is stocking diamonds to use them in his lethal weapon, a laser satellite.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 travels to Las Vegas and joins forces with the beautiful smuggler Tiffany Case, to stop a wealthy business tycoon, Blofeld, who is stocking diamonds to use them in his lethal weapon, a laser satellite.

titles.title: Quantum of Solace
titles.description: James Bond sets out to hunt the man who blackmailed and killed his lover, Vesper Lynd. The evidence points him to a vicious business tycoon named Dominic Greene, who has forged a deal with Medrano, an exiled general, that he will hand control of entire Latin America to him in exchange for an area of land that buries underneath it one of the world's most precious natural resources.
titles.shortDescription: James Bond sets out to hunt the man who blackmailed and killed his lover. The evidence points him to a vicious business tycoon who has forged a deal with an exiled general to gain control of one of the world's most precious natural resources.

titles.title: Everything or Nothing the Untold Story of 007
titles.description: This film features the stories of three men, James Bond producers named Albert R. Broccoli, Harry Saltzman, and author Ian Fleming, with the same dream. It portrays the history of the longest-running film franchise.
titles.shortDescription: This film features the stories of three men, James Bond producers named Albert R. Broccoli, Harry Saltzman, and author Ian Fleming, with the same dream. It portrays the history of the longest-running film franchise.

titleLocalized.en: Everything or Nothing the Untold Story of 007

titles.title: Never Say Never Again
titles.description: After a mistake made by Bond, M suspends him from active duty believing he is no more capable of fulfilling his tasks. However, he must reinstate Agent 007 when SPECTRE comes into play led by Fatima Bush and steals two nuclear missiles from the U.S. military. Now Bond must find their targets before they are discharged.
titles.shortDescription: After a mistake made by Bond, M suspends him from active duty believing he is no more capable of fulfilling his tasks. However, he must reinstate Agent 007 when SPECTRE comes into play and steals two nuclear missiles from the U.S. military.

titles.title: Goldfinger
titles.description: Special Agent 007 encounters yet another case where he comes face to face with a cunning international smuggler. Bond must stop his sinister plan to handicap the economy by preventing him from robbing Fort Knox gold reserves.
titles.shortDescription: Special Agent 007 encounters yet another case where he comes face to face with a cunning international smuggler. Bond must stop his sinister plan to handicap the economy by preventing him from robbing Fort Knox gold reserves.

titles.title: Skyfall
titles.description: When James Bond's assignment goes horribly wrong, all undercover agents around the world are unmasked, leading to a disastrous turn of events. M16 comes under attack and they are forced to relocate to a new location. In this terrible situation, Bond is assigned a task to track down Silva.
titles.shortDescription: When James Bond's assignment goes horribly wrong, all undercover agents around the world are unmasked and M16 comes under attack, leading to a disastrous turn of events. In this terrible situation, Bond is assigned a task to track down Silva.

titles.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
titles.description: Agent 007 teams up with Tracy Di Vicenzo to fight against a sinister organization called SPECTRE, from fulfilling Blofeld's plan of launching a germ that will kill millions. He develops a love relationship with Blofeld's daughter just as he about to be thrown in a dangerous situation.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 teams up with Tracy Di Vicenzo to fight against a sinister organization, from fulfilling Blofeld's plan that will kill millions. He develops a love relationship with Blofeld's daughter just as he about to be thrown in a dangerous situation.

titles.title: Moonraker
titles.description: Agent 007 is sent to Venice, Rio De Janeiro and outer space to find the culprit who hijacked an American space shuttle. Hence, he teams up with a beautiful CIA agent named Holly Goodhead and together they struggle through a life-and-death situation to prevent a megalomaniac tycoon's plan of erasing all humanity, from reaching fulfillment.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 is sent to outer space to find the culprit who hijacked an American space shuttle. He teams up with a beautiful CIA agent and together they struggle through a life-and-death situation to prevent an evil tycoon's plan from fulfilling.

titles.title: Live and Let Die
titles.description: Agent 007, after the murder of three of his colleagues, sets out to stop a powerful heroine producer named Kananga. Eluding the attacks of various assassins, Bond tries to unravel Kananga's sinister plan and comes across a beautiful tarot-card reader named Solitaire, whose magic is the key to his criminal activities.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007, after the murder of three of his colleagues, sets out to stop a powerful heroine producer. Eluding the attacks of various assassins, Bond tries to unravel his sinister plan and comes across a beautiful tarot-card reader named Solitaire.

titles.title: The Living Daylights
titles.description: When KGB officer named Georgi Koskov reveals that defectors will be assassinated as per the policy devised by the new KGB head named Leonid Pushkin, Agent 007 sets out to thwart their plan. As he travels across the world to stop criminal activities, he must also fight against an arms dealer who plans to start another world war.
titles.shortDescription: When KGB officer reveals that defectors will be assassinated as per the policy devised by the new KGB head, Agent 007 sets out to thwart their plan. Furthermore, he must also fight against an arms dealer who plans to start another world war.

titles.title: Octopussy
titles.description: Following the death of a fellow agent, Agent 007 travels across the world to stop Octopussy, the head of an international jewel-smuggling operation, who is involved in a military scheme to disguise a nuclear attack in Europe and then defeat N.A.T.O. forces.
titles.shortDescription: Following the death of a fellow agent, Agent 007 sets out to stop Octopussy, the head of an international jewel-smuggling operation, who is involved in a military scheme to disguise a nuclear attack in Europe and then defeat N.A.T.O. forces.

titles.title: Licence to Kill
titles.description: Following the murder of his newly-wed friend, James Bond goes rogue and sets out to not only fight for justice but also seek vengeance for his friend by hunting one of the international drug supplier's most ruthless and influential leaders.
titles.shortDescription: Following the murder of his newly-wed friend, James Bond goes rogue and sets out to not only fight for justice but also seek vengeance for his friend by hunting one of the international drug supplier's most ruthless and influential leaders.

titles.title: Dr. No
titles.description: A fearless secret Agent 007 is on a mission to catch a mysterious scientist who threatens to destroy the U.S. space program. Hence, he travels to Jamaica to look into the case of the disappearance of a colleague and to thwart the scientist's attempts.
titles.shortDescription: A fearless secret Agent 007 is on a mission to catch a mysterious scientist who threatens to destroy the U.S. space program. Hence, he travels to Jamaica to look into the case of the disappearance of a colleague and to stop the scientist's plan.

titles.title: GoldenEye
titles.description: Agent 007 must stop his former ally-turned-enemy named Alec Trevelyan, also known as Agent 006, who has got his hands on a powerful nuclear space weapon that could destroy the entire Earth with one simple button, along with battling a ravishing assassin named Xenia Onatopp.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 must stop his former ally-turned-enemy, Agent 006, who has got his hands on a powerful nuclear space weapon that could destroy the entire Earth, along with battling a ravishing assassin named Xenia Onatopp.

titles.title: Spectre
titles.description: James Bond sets out to uncover a sinister organization and learns that it goes by the name of SPECTRE. He seeks the help of Madeleine Swann, the daughter of an old adversary, whom he thinks may have intel on the organization. However, he soon discovers an unsettling connection between himself and the enemy he is looking for.
titles.shortDescription: Bond sets out to uncover a sinister organization and seeks the help of the daughter of an old adversary, whom he thinks may have intel on it. However, he soon discovers an unsettling connection between himself and the enemy he is looking for.

titles.title: You Only Live Twice
titles.description: After faking his own death and in an attempt to prevent the nuclear war, Agent 007 joins forces with Japanese Tiger Tanaka and Aki to investigate how one of the aircrafts, that were stolen during the Cold War, landed in the Sea of Japan, and find the real culprit behind it.
titles.shortDescription: After faking his own death and in an attempt to prevent the nuclear war, Agent 007 teams up with Tiger Tanaka and Aki to investigate how one of the aircrafts, that were stolen during the Cold War, landed in the Sea of Japan.

titles.title: For Your Eyes Only
titles.description: Agent 007 sets out on a most compelling adventure, to prevent global destruction when a British ship carrying a nuclear submarine control system is sunk in the waters of the Ionian Sea, and all of the world's superpowers immerse themselves in a struggle to get their hands on it.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 sets out to prevent global destruction when a British ship carrying a nuclear submarine control system is sunk in the waters of the Ionian Sea, and all of the world's superpowers immerse themselves in a struggle to get their hands on it.

titles.title: The World Is Not Enough
titles.description: Bond is assigned to protect Elektra King, the daughter of a murdered oil magnate, from her previous kidnapper. He also sets out to thwart the schemes of Renard, who is unable to feel any pain due to a bullet lodged in his head.
titles.shortDescription: Bond is assigned to protect Elektra King, the daughter of a murdered oil magnate, from her previous kidnapper. He also sets out to thwart the schemes of Renard, who is unable to feel any pain due to a bullet lodged in his head.

titles.title: The Man with the Golden Gun
titles.description: As Agent 007 searches for a dangerous stolen device that can transform sun's light into a lethal weapon, he comes across the sinister Francisco Scaramanga. Bond joins forces with a woman named Mary Goodnight and together, they set out to hunt him down. As they reach the tropical isle hideout, they might be in for a final deadly battle.
titles.shortDescription: As Agent 007 searches for a dangerous stolen device that can transform sun's light into a lethal weapon, he comes across the sinister Francisco Scaramanga. Bond joins forces with Mary Goodnight and together they hunt him down to a tropical isle.

titleLocalized.en: The Man with the Golden Gun

titles.title: Thunderball
titles.description: Agent 007 must fight against a criminal organization named SPECTRE who has hijacked a nuclear bomber and hidden bombs under the ocean, threatening to blow them up unless a huge ransom of £100 million is paid. Hence, he not only has to face attacks from men but also deadly sharks, in attempts to thwart SPECTRE's agenda.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 must fight against a criminal organization who has hijacked a nuclear bomber and hidden bombs under the ocean, threatening to blow them up unless a heavy ransom of £100 million is paid.

titles.title: Die Another Day
titles.description: After being released from an exhausting prison sentence in North Korea, Bond is convinced that someone from his own agency set him up. Hence, he travels to Cuba in search of the traitor, who turns out to be Zao. As he tries to uncover his scheme involving a highly catastrophic laser, Bond gets romantically involved with NSA agent named Jinx.
titles.shortDescription: After being released from a prison sentence in North Korea, Bond is convinced that someone from his own agency set him up. Hence, he sets out in search of the traitor. As he tries to uncover his scheme, Bond gets romantically involved with Jinx.

titles.title: From Russia with Love
titles.description: Agent 007 heads out to battle a crime organization known as SPECTRE that wants to get its hands on the device called Lektor which can access Russian state secrets. To get Bond to help them, they use a naive Russian woman. Hence, he travels to Istanbul and willingly puts himself in a situation where only his wits can save his life.
titles.shortDescription: Agent 007 heads out to battle a crime organization that wants to get its hands on the device which can access Russian state secrets. Hence, he travels to Istanbul and willingly puts himself in a situation where only his wits can save his life.

titles.title: Spartacus: Vengeance
titles.description: Season two of the acclaimed STARZ Original series. On the heels of the bloody escape from the House of Batiatus that concluded "Spartacus: Blood And Sand", the gladiator rebellion continues and begins to strike fear into the heart of the Roman Republic. Gaius Claudius Glaber and his Roman troops are sent to Capua to crush the growing band of freed slaves that Spartacus leads before it can inflict further damage. Spartacus is presented with the choice of satisfying his personal need for vengeance or making the larger sacrifices necessary to keep his budding army from breaking apart.
titles.shortDescription: Season two of the acclaimed STARZ Original series. Spartacus resumes in epic fashion. Following the bloody escape from the House of Batiatus, the gladiator rebellion descends upon the Roman Republic.

titles.title: Spartacus: Gods Of The Arena
titles.description: A STARZ Original series. Prequel to "Spartacus: Blood And Sand". The House of Batiatus is on the rise, basking in the glow of its infamous champion Gannicus, whose skill with a sword is matched only by his thirst for wine and women. These are the times a young Batiatus has been waiting for. Poised to overthrow his father and take control, he'll freely betray anyone to ensure his gladiators are in the highest demand. And he'll have his loyal and calculating wife Lucretia by his side for every underhanded scheme, drawing on the brazen talents of her seductive friend Gaia when it counts. Together, they will stop at nothing to deceive the masses, seize power, and bleed Capua dry.
titles.shortDescription: A STARZ Original series. Prequel to "Spartacus: Blood And Sand". The House of Batiatus is on the rise as we explore the deadly history before the arrival of Spartacus, and the death he carried with him.

titles.title: The White Princess
titles.description: Sequel to “The White Queen”. Henry Tudor defeats Richard III in a battle to end the decades-long ‘War of the Roses’ between the houses of Lancaster and York, and ascends to the English throne as Henry VIII. To unite the warring families he marries Elizabeth of York - the White Queen’s daughter – but the rift runs deep, and the war that erupts between the pair threatens to tear the kingdom apart again.
titles.shortDescription: Sequel to "The White Queen". Although the union of Henry VII and his wife, Elizabeth of York, may have settled the ‘War of the Roses’, it can’t stop the war between them.

titles.title: The Rook
titles.description: Myfanwy Thomas wakes up in the rain beside London’s Millennium Bridge with no memory of who she is and no way to explain the dead bodies around her. When Myfanwy discovers she is a high-ranking official in the Checquy, Britain’s last secret service for people with paranormal abilities, she will have to navigate the world of the agency to uncover who wiped her memory and why she is a target.
titles.shortDescription: When a woman wakes up surrounded by dead bodies with her memory erased, she must uncover her mysterious past to learn the truth.

titles.title: Spartacus: Blood And Sand
titles.description: Season one of the acclaimed STARZ Original series. Betrayed by the Romans. Forced into slavery. Reborn as a Gladiator. The classic tale of the Republic's most infamous rebel comes alive in this graphic and visceral series. Torn from his homeland and the woman he loves, Spartacus is condemned to the brutal world of the arena where blood and death are primetime entertainment. But not all battles are fought upon the sands. Treachery, corruption, and the allure of sensual pleasures will constantly test Spartacus. To survive, he must become more than a man. More than a gladiator, he must become a legend.
titles.shortDescription: Season one of the acclaimed STARZ Original series. The world of gladiators is graphically brought to life as the Roman Republic's most brutal fighters clash in the ultimate arena.

titles.title: Power
titles.description: Empires are built on power, and wealthy drug kingpin James St. Patrick has it all. Adept at managing his narcotics business, St. Patrick is known as “Ghost” because no one can connect him to his well-planned drug dealing network. As his double life begins to take its toll, a new venture provides the opportunity to make the break from his illicit dealings. Executive produced by Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson.
titles.shortDescription: A crime series with a hip-hop flavor, this violent, sexy and slick series is executive produced by Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson, and is heavily influenced by a rich history of mob tales.

titles.title: Da Vinci's Demons
titles.description: The path that forged Leonardo da Vinci's gift of superhuman genius is fraught with conflict as he searches for the truth and seeks to expose those who suppress it. He yearns for knowledge, but as the ultimate free thinker in Renaissance Florence, the 25-year-old da Vinci struggles to live within the confines of his own reality and time. A visionary both ostracized and celebrated for his ideas, da Vinci begins not only to see the future, but to invent it.
titles.shortDescription: Emmy-winning historical series. A fictional account of the early life of genius Leonardo da Vinci – the most famous artist of all time.

titles.title: Spartacus: War Of The Damned
titles.description: A STARZ Original series. The third and final season of Spartacus takes place following the defeat of Roman commander Gaius Claudius Glaber. Spartacus and his men have amassed major victories against the Romans after the Battle of Vesuvius. These victories have not only forged the legend of Spartacus, but have greatly increased the ranks of the rebellion slaves to more than thirty thousand. Rome is indeed beginning to tremble at the threat Spartacus now represents.
titles.shortDescription: Third and final season of the acclaimed STARZ Original series. After the defeat of Roman commander Gaius Claudius Glaber, Rome is indeed beginning to tremble at the threat Spartacus now represents.

titles.title: THE SPANISH PRINCESS
titles.description: Catherine of Aragon is the Princess of Spain, who has been promised the English throne all her life. She arrives  in a rain-lashed  England  with  her  glorious  and  diverse  court, including  her ladies-in-waiting, Lina and Rosa. When her husband dies suddenly, the throne seems lost to Catherine until she setsher sights on the new heir, the future King Henry VIII.
titles.shortDescription: “The Spanish Princess” is a vivid and captivating story told uniquely from the point of view of the women, which also sheds light on a previously untold corner of history: the lives of people of color in 16th century London.

titles.title: The White Queen
titles.description: It’s 1464 and England has been at war for nine years due to the bloody War of the Roses between the House of York and the House of Lancaster over who is the country's true king. Young Edward IV, heir to the House of York, is crowned king with help from master manipulator Lord Warwick who has a plan to control the throne, but the plan comes crashing down when Edward falls in love with Lancastrian commoner Elizabeth Woodville. A violent struggle for the crown ensues between Woodville, adversary Margaret Beaufort and Anne Neville, a pawn in her father's power game.
titles.shortDescription: British costume drama. A tale of love, loss, betrayal and murder woven through the stories of three different yet equally driven women caught up in the ongoing conflict for the throne of England.

titles.title: Laal Kabootar
titles.description: Adeel is a cab driver while Aliya is a widow desperate to find and bring justice to the target killers who murdered her husband. In a circumstantial meeting, the two realize they can help each other. Adeel, through his contacts on the streets, can help Aliya find her husband’s murderer. In exchange, she’ll give him enough money to flee to Dubai. But neither of them realize they’re in over their heads, and so begins an intriguing cat and mouse game through the streets of Karachi.
titles.shortDescription: While Adeel is looking for a way to escape to Dubai, Alia is determined to avenge the murder of her husband. As they both indulge in individual scheming and plotting, they are unaware of what they are getting themselves into: threats, torment, and the potential unveiling of a crooked empire.

titles.title: Wrath of the Titans
titles.description: Gods have become weak due to mankind's lack of devotion to them. As a result, Titans escape from Tartarus, where they were imprisoned by the gods a long time ago. Now an army of the Titans, led by their leader, Kronos, is taking over Mount Olympus and have captured Zeus. Hence, Perseus, along with a group, sets out to rescue him and save the human race.
titles.shortDescription: Gods have become weak due to mankind's lack of devotion, resulting in the escape of Titans from Tartarus, where they were imprisoned a long time ago. They capture Zeus. Hence, Perseus sets out to rescue him and save the human race.

titles.title: Cradle 2 the Grave
titles.description: After managing to pull off a major heist and successfully stealing the black diamonds with the help of his team, thief Anthony Fait puts a Taiwanese agent named Su on his trail. It is when Fait's daughter Vanessa gets kidnapped by Su's former partner, also a ruthless criminal now, that the two plan to work together to get back Fait's daughter, also giving Su the chance to avenge his ex-partner.
titles.shortDescription: After successfully stealing the black diamonds, Anthony Fait puts an agent named Su on his trail. But when Fait's daughter gets kidnapped by Su's former partner, also a ruthless criminal now, the two plan to work together to save Fait's daughter.

titles.title: Hercules
titles.description: Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord. Based on Radical Comics 'Hercules' by Steve Moore, this ensemble-action film is a revisionist take on the classic myth.
titles.shortDescription: Featuring an ensemble cast including Dwayne Johnson, John Hurt, and Joseph Fiennes, this epic action film is a radical take on the classic Greek myth.

titles.title: Police Story 4: First Strike
titles.description: Jackie Chan, a Hong Kong police detective, is working with the CIA to follow a woman named Natasha who is smuggling U.S. currency and supplying it to a terrorist named Tsui who is trying to purchase a nuclear warhead from the Russian Mafia. Teaming up with Russian intelligence, they travel to Australia tracing Tsui's path. In an attempt to stop the terrorists from succeeding in their agenda, Jackie Chan will do everything he can; from battling underwater to across mountain tops!
titles.shortDescription: Jackie Chan is working with the CIA to follow a woman who is supplying U.S. currency to a terrorist, Tsui, who is to purchase a nuclear warhead from the Russian Mafia. Teaming up with the Russian intelligence, they travel to Australia tracing Tsui's path.

titles.title: Rush Hour 2
titles.description: Los Angeles Police Department detective, James Carter, and Hong Kong Police inspector, Lee, while on a vacation together to Hong Kong, find themselves in the middle of yet another case. As they try to search for the mastermind behind a bomb explosion in the American embassy that murdered two U.S. custom agents, they first have to go through one of the most powerful Triad gangsters in Asia, Ricky Tan.
titles.shortDescription: James Carter and Lee find themselves in the middle of yet another case. As they try to search for the mastermind behind an explosion at the U.S. embassy, they first have to go through one of the most powerful Triad gangsters in Asia, Ricky Tan.

titles.title: Constantine
titles.description: John Constantine, a demon hunter and a suicide survivor, with an extraordinary gift helps a police woman, Angela Dodson, investigate the suicide of her twin sister. John Constantine, having literally been to hell and back, is aware that when he dies, he will go to the underworld with no chance of moving to heaven unless he does enough good deeds in this world. In order to prove to her that her sister's death was not merely a suicide but something more, he gets caught up in a world of demons.
titles.shortDescription: John Constantine, a demon hunter, with an extraordinary gift helps a police woman investigate the suicide of her twin sister. To prove to her that her sister's death was not merely a suicide but something more, he gets caught up in a world of demons.

titles.title: Rush Hour
titles.description: Hong Kong Detective, Inspector Lee, is called to assist the FBI when a Chinese diplomat's daughter is kidnapped in Los Angeles. The FBI, not wanting to involve the Inspector, cast him away and dump him off on the LAPD who put Detective James Carter on the task of keeping him away from the investigation. But these unwanted misfit detectives will do everything in their power to find the missing girl.
titles.shortDescription: Inspector Lee is called to assist the FBI in the kidnapping case of a diplomat's daughter. The FBI, not wanting to involve the Inspector, dump him off on the LAPD who put Detective James Carter on the task of keeping him away from the investigation.

titles.title: Spawn
titles.description: Al Simmons, an assassin, who is betrayed and murdered by his boss, is given a chance to return to earth provided he leads an evil army. He agrees and is reincarnated as a burnt, scarred Hellspawn. However, upon arrival, he starts serving the forces of good despite his temptations to return to his prior life.
titles.shortDescription: Al Simmons, an assassin, who is betrayed and murdered by his boss, is given a chance to return to earth provided he leads an evil army. He agrees and is reincarnated as a Hellspawn. However, upon arrival, he starts serving the forces of good.

titles.title: Blade
titles.description: Just when his mother was about to give birth to him, she got attacked by a vampire. Hence Blade was born as a half mortal and half immortal man. With the assistance of a vampire detective, Hannibal King, and Dracula-descendent, Frank Drake, he sets out to avenge the death of his mother and wipe the world clean of all evil vampires. His special blood type is what the vampires need in order to summon an evil god to erase all mankind from the world.
titles.shortDescription: Blade, a half mortal, half immortal man, sets out to avenge the death of his mother and wipe the world clean of all evil vampires. His special blood type is what the vampires need in order to summon an evil god to erase all mankind from the world.

titles.title: Edge Of Tomorrow
titles.description: When Earth falls under attack from invincible aliens, no military unit in the world is able to beat them. Forced into a war against the extraterrestrial enemy which can ‘reset’ the day, Lt. Col. Bill Cage is killed within minutes. Cage now finds himself inexplicably thrown into a time loop — forcing him to live out the same brutal combat over and over, fighting and dying again and again. Teaming up with Special Forces warrior Rita Vrataski, Cage finds each repeated encounter gets them one step closer to defeating the enemy and ending the war.
titles.shortDescription: A military officer (Tom Cruise) is forced into a war against an extraterrestrial enemy which can ‘reset’ the day. Enabled with the same power, the officer teams up with a Special Forces warrior to try and end the war.

titles.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
titles.description: Napoleon Solo, a CIA agent, and Illya Kuryakin, a KGB operative, have to work together on a mission against a mysterious criminal organization that aims to disrupt the relations between the United States and the Soviet Union by means of nuclear weapons and technology. With the daughter of a missing German scientist as their only lead, the two must engage in a race against time in order to prevent a worldwide calamity.
titles.shortDescription: A CIA agent and a KGB operative have to work together on a mission against a criminal organization that aims to disrupt the relations between the U.S. and the Soviet Union. The two must engage in a race against time to prevent a worldwide calamity.

titles.title: Out Of Time
titles.description: The police chief of a small Florida town, Matt Lee Whitlock, is in the process of divorcing his detective wife, Alex. He begins a passionate affair with Ann, only to find out that she's stricken with terminal cancer. Matt steals a large sum of money confiscated from a drug bust in order to pay for Ann's treatment, but when she apparently dies in a suspicious fire, the money disappears, and all the clues point to Matt as the culprit.
titles.shortDescription: When a murder occurs in a quiet Florida community, a well-respected local police chief finds himself as the main suspect.

titles.title: Romeo Must Die
titles.description: Hang Li, a former police officer, comes from Hong Kong to the United States to avenge the death of his brother. He finds out that her brother was involved in a combat against an African-American gang which was led by a man named Isaak. Soon he finds himself falling for the daughter of his rival and finds himself torn between his love for her and his thirst for justice.
titles.shortDescription: Hang Li, a former police officer, comes from Hong Kong to the United States to avenge the death of his brother. He finds himself falling for the daughter of his rival and finds himself torn between his love for her and his thirst for justice.

titles.title: Demolition Man
titles.description: A police officer John Spartan and a violent criminal Simon Phoenix are sentenced to "CryoPrison". After 36 years in the year 2032, Spartan is thawed in a utopic version of Los Angeles, now known as San Angeles. But with a psychotic killer Phoenix again on the loose, who proceeds to go on a murder spree, Spartan along with a future cop Lenina, must capture him.
titles.shortDescription: A police officer John Spartan and a violent criminal Simon Phoenix are sentenced to "CryoPrison". After 36 years, Spartan is thawed to team up with a future cop Lenina to capture a psychotic killer Phoenix, who proceeds to go on a murder spree.

titles.title: Ninja Assassin
titles.description: Raizo, a member of a secret ninja clan called the Ozunu, is raised to be an assassin and an unstoppable killing machine. But after Ozunu murder his friend, their days as a secret society are about to end. Riazo escapes the clan and vanishes. In Berlin, an agent named Mika Coretti learns about the clan by discovering a money trail that is linked to several murders. Raizo saves her from them and then teams up with her to bring down Ozunu once and for all.
titles.shortDescription: Raizo, a member of a secret ninja clan called the Ozunu, is raised to be an assassin. But after Ozunu murder his friend, he escapes the clan and vanishes and teams up with an agent named Mika Coretti to bring down Ozunu once and for all.

titles.title: A Man Apart
titles.description: Two DEA operatives, Agent Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks successfully capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord. A new man called Diablo emerges to head the drug association. But when Sean's wife gets murdered by him, Sean along with his partner joins forces with the Cartel's former imprisoned boss to take down the dangerous and mysterious new player and to avenge the death of his wife.
titles.shortDescription: A new man called Diablo emerges to head the drug association and kills Agent Sean's wife. So the latter joins forces with the Cartel's former imprisoned boss to take down the dangerous and mysterious new player and to avenge the death of his wife.

titles.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
titles.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.
titles.shortDescription: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

titles.title: Sucker Punch
titles.description: Tired of being locked away by her abusive step-father and in an attempt to regain her freedom, a young woman named Babydoll enters a fantasy world in her mind, where she is not a prisoner. She teams up with four women named Rocket, Blondie, Amber, and Sweet Pea to devise a plan to escape from the clutches of their destiny. Battling different beings along their way, the girls wonder if they will ever be able to make it out alive.
titles.shortDescription: Tired of being locked away and in an attempt to regain her freedom, a young woman named Babydoll enters a fantasy world in her mind and teams up with four women to make an escape. They wonder if they will ever be able to make it out alive.

titles.title: Deadly Impact
titles.description: Thomas Armstrong knows how it feels to be caught in a killer's crosshairs. The survivor of a vicious attack by a skilled hitman, Thomas gets his one shot at settling the score when the trigger-happy maniac returns with a vengeance.
titles.shortDescription: A police officer with a painful past returns home to help the FBI track down a mastermind assassin.

titles.title: Blade: Trinity
titles.description: Blade, part-human and part-vampire, is framed for numerous murders that he did not commit by Danica Talos, a vampire leader who is hell-bent on finally making her team victorious. In the midst of being hunted by the FBI due to his bad publicity and in his efforts to try to save humanity from blood-thirsty vampires, he has no choice left than to join forces with a crew of rogue vampire hunters led by Hannibal King and Whistler's daughter, Abigail.
titles.shortDescription: Blade, part-human and part-vampire, is framed for numerous murders. In the midst of being hunted by the FBI and in his efforts to try to save humanity from vampires, he has no choice left than to join forces with a crew of rogue vampire hunters.

titles.title: Torque
titles.description: So as to get hold of the motorcycles that contain crystal meth in them, gangster Henry James frames biker Cary Ford for the murder of Junior, who happens to be Trey's brother, leader of the country's most feared biker gang. Hence Ford is left with no choice than to make a run for it. However, in an attempt to clear his name of the murder, he must outrace both Trey's bikers, who are thirsty for his blood, as well as the FBI who want him arrested.
titles.shortDescription: So as to get hold of the motorcycles that contain crystal meth in them, Henry James frames Cary Ford for the murder of Trey's brother, leader of the most feared biker gang. To clear his name, Ford is left with no other choice than to make a run for it.

titles.title: Three Kings
titles.description: After the Gulf war is over, three American soldiers led by Sergeant Major Archie Gates, set out to steal the hidden gold that was stolen from Kuwait. Sergeant Troy Barlow is captured by the Iraqis while the rest three are rescued by Iraqi rebels. Instead of finding the gold, however, they discover people who are in desperate need of their help.
titles.shortDescription: After the Gulf war is over, three American soldiers led by Sergeant Major Archie Gates, set out to steal the hidden gold that was stolen from Kuwait. Instead of finding the gold, however, they discover people who are in desperate need of their help.

titles.title: Bruce Lee: The Curse Of The Dragon
titles.description: This documentary encompasses the life and the mysterious death of Bruce Lee: a legendary actor, director and martial artist. It does a thorough analysis of his life by interviewing those who were closest to him including his son, his student, a professional athlete Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and a martial artist plus actor Chuck Norris.
titles.shortDescription: This documentary encompasses the life and the mysterious death of Bruce Lee: a legendary actor, director, and martial artist. It does a thorough analysis of his life by interviewing those who were closest to him.

titleLocalized.en: Bruce Lee: The Curse Of The Dragon

titles.title: San Andreas
titles.description: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.
titles.shortDescription: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

titles.title: Swordfish
titles.description: Gabriel Shear, leader of an anti-terrorist group called Black Cell, wants to steal $6 billion that are locked up in unused government funds, to wage a war against international tourism. For that purpose, he hires a convicted computer hacker, Stanley Jobson, who is recently released from prison to help him break into the system.
titles.shortDescription: Gabriel Shear, the leader of an anti-terrorist group wants to steal $6 billion that are locked up in unused government funds, to wage a war against international tourism. He hires a convicted computer hacker to help him break into the system.

titles.title: Wild Wild West
titles.description: A charming civil War champion, James West, and a smart U.S. Marshal, Artemus Gordon, team up to protect the president Ulysses S. Grant from Dr. Arliss Loveless, a villain, who plans to assassinate him. Hence, the two work together to catch Loveless. And with the assistance of a stranger, they get even closer to arresting him than they ever were.
titles.shortDescription: Civil War champion, James West, and U.S. Marshal, Artemus Gordon, team up to protect the president of U.S. against Loveless, who plans to assassinate him. With the assistance of a stranger, the two get even closer to arresting him than they ever were.

titles.title: Superman Returns
titles.description: Returning to earth after five years, Superman learns that the world as he left it has changed. Louis Lane, his love interest has moved on with her life and now has a son. Lex Luther, in an attempt to destroy Superman once and for all, is plotting against him and experimenting with Kryptonite. Superman has to struggle in order to make his place in the life of Louis, who no longer loves him, and this world that no longer needs him.
titles.shortDescription: Returning to earth after five years, Superman learns that the world as he left it has changed and Louis Lane has moved on with her life. Lex Luther, in an attempt to destroy Superman, is plotting against him and experimenting with Kryptonite.

titles.title: Payback
titles.description: After Lynn finds out that her husband Porter cheated on her, she along with his best friend, Val, shoots him after a successful heist. However, their plan wasn't well thought of which is why after his recovery, Porter sets out in their search to seek revenge from them and get his share of the money. With the help of a prostitute, Rosie, he manages to capture Val but to get his money, he will have to work harder than that.
titles.shortDescription: After Lynn finds out that her husband Porter cheated on her, she and his best friend, Val, shoot him after a successful heist. After his recovery, Porter sets out to seek revenge and get his share of the money that they stole from him.

titles.title: Blade II
titles.description: Blade, half-man and half-vampire, is consumed by a thirst to avenge the death of his mother and save mankind from blood-sucking vampires. But as Reapers, terrifying creatures who feed on vampires, rise to the front threatening both mankind and vampires, he is compelled to form an unwanted coalition with the vampires to defeat them.
titles.shortDescription: Blade is consumed by a thirst to avenge his mother's death and save mankind from vampires. But as Reapers rise to the front threatening both mankind and vampires, he is compelled to form an unwanted coalition!

titles.title: The Flash
titles.description: After being struck by dark matter lightning in his lab, forensic scientist Barry Allen develops the ability to move at superhuman speed. Barry discovers that many other people were affected by the event – most of whom are using their newfound powers for evil. Determined to be a force for good, Barry becomes ‘The Flash’, and dedicates his life to fighting these threats. However, secret forces are determined to manipulate him for their own agenda.
titles.shortDescription: After being struck by dark matter lightning, a forensic scientist uses his new powers of super speed to become a superhero – The Flash.

titles.title: Masters Of Horror
titles.description: Anthology style television series featuring 13 horror stories from some of the most respected writers and directors to grace the genre in the past thirty years. Each episode is its own independent story combining beloved horror short-stories or original scripts from world-renowned "masters of horror".
titles.shortDescription: Anthology style television series featuring stories from some of the greatest and most respected horror genre directors of the past three decades.

titles.title: Power
titles.description: Empires are built on power, and wealthy drug kingpin James St. Patrick has it all. Adept at managing his narcotics business, St. Patrick is known as “Ghost” because no one can connect him to his well-planned drug dealing network. As his double life begins to take its toll, a new venture provides the opportunity to make the break from his illicit dealings. Executive produced by Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson.
titles.shortDescription: A crime series with a hip-hop flavor, this violent, sexy and slick series is executive produced by Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson, and is heavily influenced by a rich history of mob tales.

titles.title: Da Vinci's Demons
titles.description: The path that forged Leonardo da Vinci's gift of superhuman genius is fraught with conflict as he searches for the truth and seeks to expose those who suppress it. He yearns for knowledge, but as the ultimate free thinker in Renaissance Florence, the 25-year-old da Vinci struggles to live within the confines of his own reality and time. A visionary both ostracized and celebrated for his ideas, da Vinci begins not only to see the future, but to invent it.
titles.shortDescription: Emmy-winning historical series. A fictional account of the early life of genius Leonardo da Vinci – the most famous artist of all time.

titles.title: The Vampire Diaries
titles.description: Two vampire brothers decide to visit the town of Mystic Falls where they both fall for the same girl, Elena Gilbert. She gets into a relationship with the younger brother, Stefan Salvatore. However, her entire world turns upside down when she learns an overwhelming truth about herself and the reality of the vampire brothers.
titles.shortDescription: Two vampire brothers visit Mystic Falls where they both fall for the same girl, Elena Gilbert. She gets into a relationship with the younger brother. However, her entire world turns upside down when she learns the reality of the vampire brothers.

titles.title: The Walking Dead
titles.description: Gritty ‘edge-of-your-seat’ thriller that portrays the world after a zombie apocalypse. Led by deputy sheriff Rick Grimes, a group of survivors find themselves constantly on the move in search of a safe and secure home. But the pressure each day to stay alive sends many in the group to the deepest depths of human cruelty, and Rick discovers that the overwhelming fear of the survivors can be more terrifying than the undead walking among them.
titles.shortDescription: Riveting ‘edge-of-your-seat’ thriller series. After a zombie apocalypse, a group of survivors discover that the overwhelming fear of the living is far more deadly than the ‘undead’ walking among them.

titles.title: Friends
titles.description: Top-rated comedy series about six twenty-something friends – neat freak chef Monica, spoilt daddy’s girl Rachel, offbeat massage therapist Phoebe, geeky paleontologist Ross, sardonic dry wit Chandler, and womanizing actor Joey – who share life, love and laughter in Manhattan.
titles.shortDescription: Top-rated comedy series about the lives, loves, and laughs of six twenty-something friends living in Manhattan.

titles.title: BLINDSPOT
titles.description: FBI agent Kurt Weller is drawn into a complex conspiracy when a naked amnesiac, Jane Doe, is found covered from head-to-toe in a series of cryptic tattoos... including his name on her back. As Weller and his colleagues investigate the tattooed ‘clues’, they are drawn into a high-stakes underworld that twists and turns through a labyrinth of secrets and revelations – and the information they uncover might ultimately change the world.
titles.shortDescription: An FBI agent is drawn into a complex conspiracy when a naked amnesiac woman is found in Times Square covered in a series of cryptic tattoos.

titles.title: The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo
titles.description: A discredited journalist and a mysterious computer hacker discover that even the wealthiest families have skeletons in their closets while working to solve the mystery of a 40-year-old murder in this remake of the 2009 Swedish thriller of the same name. Inspired by Stieg Larsson's successful trilogy of books, the two stars are briefed in the disappearance of Harriet Vanger, whose uncle suspects she may have been killed by a member of their own family.
titles.shortDescription: A young hacker assists a journalist in his search for a missing woman.

titleLocalized.en: The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo

titles.title: Death to Smoochy
titles.description: When America's favorite children's TV show star, Rainbow Randolph, is fired from his job due to his corruptness and replaced by a puffy fuscia rhinoceros, he gets vengeful and sets out to seek revenge from him in order to earn his previous status as a lovable clown in the hearts of everyone. While, on the other hand, Sheldon Mopes who plays as Smoochy the Rhino gains instant popularity and finds himself moving to the heights of success.
titles.shortDescription: When America's favorite children's TV show star, Rainbow Randolph, is fired from his job due to his corruptness and replaced by a puffy fuscia rhinoceros, he gets vengeful and sets out to seek revenge from the latter.

titles.title: ROCKY V
titles.description: Retired from boxing due to his medical test results that showed irreversible brain damage, Rocky loses everything because of his accountant's mismanagement. To have it all back, he plans to re-enter the boxing world by coaching a fiery young boxer named Tommy, and take back what was snatched from him, while all the way trying to mend a deteriorating relationship with his son. Will he be able to get it all back?
titles.shortDescription: Retired from boxing, Rocky loses everything because of his accountant's mismanagement. To have it all back, he plans to re-enter the boxing world by coaching a fiery young boxer named Tommy, and take back what was snatched from him.

titles.title: The Shawshank Redemption
titles.description: This top-rated movie of all time follows Andy Dufresne, a formerly successful banker. After he was arrested and found guilty in the murder of his wife and her lover, Andy tries to adapt to his new life in the dark prison of Shawshank.
titles.shortDescription: This top-rated movie of all time follows Andy Dufresne, a formerly successful banker. After he was arrested and found guilty in the murder of his wife and her lover, Andy tries to adapt to his new life in the dark prison of Shawshank.

titles.title: ROCKY III
titles.description: After earning the title of the world heavyweight champion and becoming rich and famous beyond his imagination, Rocky Balboa loses it all due to his pride and sluggishness. Even his title gets stolen by a young thug named Clubber Lang. To earn it all back, he seeks the help of his former rival, Apollo Creed, to get back into practice and show the world that he is still the world's best heavy-weight champion by defeating Clubber in a match.
titles.shortDescription: After becoming the world heavyweight champion and getting rich and famous beyond imagination, Rocky loses it all due to his pride and laziness. He seeks the help of his former rival to show the world that he is still the world's best champion.

titles.title: Fargo
titles.description: One cold Minnesota winter, a car salesman named Jerry heads to a small town called Fargo in a desperate quest to make money, no matter what it takes - even if it means hiring criminals to kidnap his wife and demand a ransom from his father-in-law. A pregnant police chief named Marge is tasked with investigating a string of murders suddenly taking place in her jurisdiction. More blood is spilled across the chilly tundra in a series of botched homicides as Marge hunts for clues and Jerry wraps himself in a web of lies.
titles.shortDescription: The Coen brothers spin a thrilling black comedy amid a Minnesota winter, as a desperately broke car salesman (William H. Macy) gets tangled up with criminals.

titles.title: CAPOTE
titles.description: Set in the 1950s and based on the true story of a Kansas mass murder, Capote chronicles the life of a writer Truman Capote as he travels to a small town to investigate the crime. Consumed by his own interests, Capote (played by Philip Seymour Hoffman in an Oscar-winning role) develops a questionably close relationship with one of the murder suspects and becomes emotionally attached. The murder trial stretches out over the years as Capote attempts to finish the book with no end, which eventually defines his career as a bestselling novelist but also leaves his self-respect in shambles.
titles.shortDescription: Novelist Truman Capote (Philip Seymour Hoffman in an Oscar-winning role) decides to cover a murder story, traveling to the small town with his childhood friend, aspiring novelist Harper Lee.

titles.title: Menace II Society
titles.description: 18-year-old Black youth, Caine Lawson's life is surrounded by crime and violence. With the assistance of his caring teacher and the support of his girlfriend, he attempts to escape the temptations of a mob lifestyle and leave the city for good in order to have a better standard of living. But due to a series of unfortunate events, he gets even more succumbed to the brutality that prevails in the city.
titles.shortDescription: 18-year-old, Caine Lawson's life is surrounded by crime and violence. With the assistance of his teacher and girlfriend, he attempts to escape the temptations of a mob lifestyle and leave the city for good but finds that it won't be easy.

titles.title: Boiler Room
titles.description: Eager to prove to his father that he can succeed in life, a college dropout, Seth Davis, gets a job at a stock brokerage firm that leads him on a fast track to accomplishment. His talent for making cold calls makes him climb the ladder of success faster than he thought. Soon he indulges in illegal activities to keep his bosses happy and to keep the pay checks coming his way. However, after some time, he finds out that he may not be as on a path to achievement as he believes he is.
titles.shortDescription: Eager to prove to his father that he can succeed in life, Seth Davis gets a job at a brokerage firm that leads him on a fast track to accomplishment. However, later, he finds out that he may not be as on a path to success as he believes he is.

titles.title: American History X
titles.description: Neo-Nazi skinhead, Derek Vinyard, seeks retribution for the murder of his father and in doing so, he almost destroys his life. He is sentenced to three years in prison for committing a murder. On his return from the prison, Derek changes his ways of life in hopes of preventing his younger brother, Danny, from falling into his footsteps. But since Danny idealizes his elder brother, Derek is devastated to find that he has done exactly the same!
titles.shortDescription: Derek Vinyard seeks retribution for the murder of his father and almost destroys his life. Despite all his efforts to prevent Danny from falling into his footsteps, Derrek is devastated to find that his younger brother has done exactly the same!

titles.title: Goodfellas
titles.description: Martin Scorsese explores the life of organized crime with his gritty adaptation of Nicolas Pileggi's best-selling book 'Wiseguy', the true-life account of mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill. Hill is a half-Irish, half-Sicilian New York kid who grows up idolizing the "wise guys" in his impoverished Brooklyn neighborhood. He joins the mobsters, working hard to advance through the ranks until his drug addiction causes mistakes that ultimately unravel his climb to the top.
titles.shortDescription: Martin Scorsese directs this true crime story about the rise and fall of Henry Hill (Ray Liotta), a hard-working mobster. Also stars Robert De Niro and Joe Pesci.

titles.title: Lions For Lambs
titles.description: Two determined students follow the inspiration of their idealistic professor, Dr. Malley, and make a bold decision to join the battle in Afghanistan. In California, the anguished Dr. Malley attempts to reach a privileged but disaffected student, meanwhile, the charismatic Senator Jasper Irving is about to give a bombshell story to a probing TV journalist that may affect Malley's students' fates. As arguments, memories, and bullets fly, the three stories are woven ever more tightly together, revealing how each of these Americans has a profound impact on each other and the world.
titles.shortDescription: Tom Cruise, Meryl Streep, and Robert Redford team up in a poignant and layered story of a congressman, a journalist and a professor caught up at various points during the US war on terror.

titles.title: ROCKY IV
titles.description: Rocky Balboa intends to retire and live a peaceful life with his wife named Adrian after earning the title of boxing championship. However, when his best friend gets brutally beaten to death during a match by Ivan Drago, a Russian newcomer, Rocky sets out to get payback against him and flies to Russia.
