Will he be able to defeat his adversary in an intense and long match?
titles.shortDescription: Rocky intends to retire and live a peaceful life with his wife after earning the title of boxing championship. However, when his best friend gets brutally beaten to death during a match by Ivan Drago, Rocky sets out to get payback against him.

titles.title: The Man In The Iron Mask
titles.description: Randall Wallace's visually sensational and brooding version of the Alexander Dumas legend features the Three Musketeers, a tormented D'Artagnan, and a set of man-boy twins, with Leonardo DiCaprio as both King Louis XIV and brother Philippe.
titles.shortDescription: Leonardo DiCaprio plays dual roles of a king and his twin in this adventure inspired by Alexandre Dumas' classic novel "The Three Musketeers".

titleLocalized.en: The Man In The Iron Mask

titles.title: I Am Sam
titles.description: Sam Dawson is a mentally challenged father who is fighting for the custody of his seven-year-old daughter, Lucy. As his daughter begins to outdo her father intellectually, they catch the attention of a social worker who insists on placing Lucy in foster care. In an attempt to win his daughter back, Sam develops an alliance with a self-absorbed lawyer, Rita Harrison. As she fights for his daughter, she understands the value of love and family.
titles.shortDescription: Sam Dawson is a mentally challenged father who attempts to take custody of his seven-year-old daughter, Lucy. He develops an alliance with a self-absorbed lawyer, Rita Harrison, teaching her the value of love and family along the way.

titles.title: The Assassination of Jesse James
titles.description: Jesse James, fastest gun in the West, sets out a quest to catch those who are looking for an opportunity to collect the reward that the law has placed on his head. Young Robert Ford has always admired Jesse since his childhood. He is recruited by Jesse in his gang but soon Ford starts envying him and in an attempt to take his mentor's place, tries to assassinate him!
titles.shortDescription: Jesse James sets out to catch those who are seeking an opportunity to collect the reward the law has placed on his head. Young Robert Ford who is recruited by Jesse soon starts envying him and even tries to assassinate him to take his mentor's place!

titles.title: The Fugitive
titles.description: Richard Kimble, after being wrongfully convicted of murdering his wife, makes an escape when a bus transferring him to prison has an accident. Determined to catch his wife's real murderer, he dodges Deputy Samuel Gerard who announces to search every place to find Richard. Uncovering a trail of secrets behind his wife's murder, Richard has to race against time to expose the killer before it is too late.
titles.shortDescription: Richard Kimble, after being wrongfully convicted of murdering his wife, makes an escape. Determined to catch his wife's real murderer, he dodges Deputy Samuel Gerard who announces to search every place to find Richard.

titles.title: ROCKY BALBOA
titles.description: After thirty-years into retirement, Rocky Balboa, grieving over the death of his beloved wife named Adrian, decides to re-enter his boxing life on a lower level by indulging himself in local matches. However, all that changes drastically when he accepts a challenge to take on the most popular heavy-weight champion, Mason "The Line" Dixon.
titles.shortDescription: After thirty-years into retirement, Rocky decides to re-enter his boxing life on a lower level by indulging himself in local matches. However, all that changes drastically when he accepts a challenge to take on the most popular heavy-weight champion.

titles.title: ROCKY II
titles.description: After losing a match with the world-class heavy-weight champion, Apollo Creed, and losing not only his money but also the respect of his friends and family, Rocky Balboa has accepted another challenge to fight Apollo Creed again. Against the wishes of his wife, Adrian, Rocky decides to give it one more chance to regain everything that he lost in the previous match.
titles.shortDescription: After losing a match with Apollo Creed, Rocky Balboa has accepted another challenge to fight him again. Against the wishes of his wife, Rocky decides to give it one more chance to regain everything he lost in the previous match.

titles.title: The Number 23
titles.description: When Walter Sparrow's wife gives him a book about the number 23 on his birthday, he becomes obsessed with it. While he tries to decode its messages, he is more and more convinced that the book is written on his life. As the book leads him on a path to darkness, he is horrified to find out that there are grave consequences for the main character.
titles.shortDescription: A man discovers a book about the number 23 and becomes obsessed with it. As he tries to decode its messages, he is convinced that the book is written on his life. However, he is horrified to find out what the main character has in store for him.

titles.title: ROCKY
titles.description: A small-time boxer named Rocky Balboa gets a very rare chance to take on a heavy-weight champion named Apollo Creed. Hence, he begins his training with the determined and courageous Mickey Goldmill while, at the same time, forming a love relationship with a shy woman named Adrian, who serves a local pet store.
titles.shortDescription: A small-time boxer named Rocky Balboa gets a rare chance to take on a heavy-weight champion named Apollo Creed. Hence, he begins his training with the courageous Goldmill while forming a relationship with a shy woman named Adrian.

titles.title: The Bodyguard
titles.description: When a pop singer, Rachel Marron, starts receiving disturbing threats from her stalker, she is persuaded by her manager to keep a bodyguard. Hence, she hires Frank Farmer, a former secret service agent. Farmer will do anything and everything to protect his client, and to fulfill his duty fairly. As the two spend more time together, they are close to becoming something more than just a protector and a client.
titles.shortDescription: When a pop singer starts receiving death threats, she hires Farmer as her bodyguard. Farmer will do everything to protect his client. As they spend more time together, they are close to becoming something more than just a protector and a client.

titles.title: Chudail Story
titles.description: Five friends, Chandu, Goldie, Robby, Riya and Devika, decide to go on an adventurous trip, but before they reach their destination, their car breaks down. While awaiting help, they take shelter in a house owned by Shashi, a mysterious woman with mesmerizing looks. Distracted by her beauty, the friends find themselves trapped, and escape is no longer an option.
titles.shortDescription: A seductive witch (Preeti Soni) kills men by casting a spell on them.

titles.title: Veerappan
titles.description: Based on a true story. Under the tutelage of his smuggler uncle, Veerappan becomes a notorious bandit. After the outlaw foils a covert mission to capture him, killing all of the Special Task Force officers in the process, a master strategist is recruited to take him out with Operation Cocoon, one of India, s most expensive criminal operations.
titles.shortDescription: Based on a true story. Under the tutelage of his smuggler uncle, Veerappan (Sandeep Bharadwaj) becomes one of India's most notorious, and wanted bandits.

titles.title: Bhouri
titles.description: A film that highlights the exploitation of women in a male-dominated society. Bhoura is a 23-year-old who is forced to wed a 55-year-old man in an arranged marriage.
titles.shortDescription: The tragic story of Bhouri (Masha Paur), a 23-year-old woman who is forced to marry a 55-year-old man.

titles.title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
titles.description: Musician Ayan's quest for true love remains unfulfilled as the fiercely independent Alizeh, still reeling from the effects of a recent break-up,  doesn't reciprocate his feelings. As Ayan tries to navigate their relationship to the next level, he comes across different people who make him realize the power of unrequited love.
titles.shortDescription: Still reeling from a recent break-up, a woman (Anushka Sharma) develops a friendship with a man (Ranbir Kapoor) who wants to take their relationship to the next level.

titles.title: Wazir
titles.description: When his daughter is killed by the terrorist he is chasing, grief-stricken police officer Daanish swears revenge. He finds a confidante in Pandit, an unassuming chess grandmaster who is also mourning the loss of his daughter, and the pair investigates a wider conspiracy that has darkened their lives.
titles.shortDescription: A brave cop (Farhan Akhtar) and a disabled chess grandmaster (Amitabh Bachchan) face off against a mysterious and opponent (Neil Nitin Mukesh).

titles.title: Jolly LL.B 2
titles.description: An ambitious lawyer (Akshay Kumar), representing the most critical court case of his career, finds himself in a battle with a ruthless advocate after making an innocent mistake.
titles.shortDescription: An ambitious lawyer (Akshay Kumar) finds himself in a battle with a ruthless advocate after making an innocent mistake.

titles.title: Akira
titles.description: A young girl, Akira, moves from a small town to Mumbai to start college. She unwittingly becomes the target of four corrupt police officers and fights single-handedly to prove her innocence.
titles.shortDescription: A college student single-handedly takes on four corrupt police officers in a bid to prove her innocence.

titles.title: Mastizaade
titles.description: Two womanizing bachelors fall in love with twin sisters who run a sex addiction clinic.
titles.shortDescription: Two womanizing bachelors fall in love with twin sisters who run a sex addiction clinic.

titles.title: Dark Chocolate
titles.description: The film is based on the real-life murder mystery of Sheena Bora. Bollywood actress Mahima Chaudhry makes her debut in Bengali film as Ishani Banerjee, a character based on Sheena's mother and alleged murderer Indrani Mukherjea.
titles.shortDescription: The film is based on the real-life murder mystery of Sheena Bora. Bollywood actress Mahima Chaudhry makes her debut in Bengali film as Ishani Banerjee, a character based on Sheena's mother and alleged murderer Indrani Mukherjea.

titles.title: Irada
titles.description: A mysterious bomb blast in a business tycoon's factory prompts the state CM to hire an NIA officer. He meets an ex-army man seeking revenge for his daughter's death, and a journalist demanding justice for her murdered boyfriend. Nothing is what it seems. Will the officer be able to uncover the conspiracy which threatens the future of the entire state?
titles.shortDescription: An NIA officer (Arshad Warsi) tries to unravel the conspiracy that led to the bombing of a business tycoon's factory.

titles.title: Waarrior Savitri
titles.description: An adaptation of the legendary fable of Savitri. The modern-day Savitri is adept in martial arts and will do anything to save her husband.
titles.shortDescription: A modern-day adaptation of the legendary fable of Savitri.

titles.title: Queen
titles.description: Rani is a na've young bride from Delhi who is devastated when her fianc, calls things off the day before their wedding. After asking her parents, permission, she decides to take her honeymoon trip anyway, on her own. However, as she Rani enjoys her European adventure, making new friends along the way, she is surprised to see a familiar face waiting for her in Paris.
titles.shortDescription: A young Delhi woman from a traditional family goes on a solo honeymoon when her wedding is cancelled.

titles.title: Shaandaar
titles.description: The marriage of a young man (Shahid Kapoor) and woman (Alia Bhatt) leads to a business merger between their wealthy families.
titles.shortDescription: The marriage of a young man (Shahid Kapoor) and woman (Alia Bhatt) leads to a business merger between their wealthy families.

titles.title: Traffic
titles.description: Inspired by a true story. In Pune, a young girl needs an urgent transplant. Meanwhile, a young man is declared clinically dead in Mumbai. His parents decide to donate his organs to the girl but the heart she so desperately needs must be transported from Mumbai to Pune in 150 minutes, and due to the weather, the only option is to send it by road. A disgraced traffic constable accepts the challenge.
titles.shortDescription: A young girl needs an urgent transplant, but the heart she so desperately needs must be transported from Mumbai to Pune in 150 minutes,  by road.

titles.title: One Night Stand
titles.description: The story is about Urvil Raisingh and Celina who meet at an event and a memorable night later.
titles.shortDescription: The story is about Urvil Raisingh and Celina who meet at an event and a memorable night later.

titles.title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
titles.description: Ranchi boy Mahendra Singh Dhoni aspires to play cricket for India. Though he initially tries to please his father by taking up a job on the Indian railways, he ultimately decides to chase his dreams. This is the previously untold story of Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector,  as the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.
titles.shortDescription: The untold story of M.S. Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector, as the World Cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

titles.title: Neerja
titles.description: Neerja Bhanot, a 23-year-old flight purser, boards Pan Am flight 73 in 1986. When the flight is hijacked on the tarmac of Karachi airport by terrorists, Neerja does all she can to protect the lives of the 359 men, women and children on the aircraft, becoming an international heroine in the process.
titles.shortDescription: Flight purser Neerja Bhanot (Sonam Kapoor) faces terrorists and her own fears to save her passengers when a New York-bound jet, Pan Am Flight 73 - is hijacked.

titles.title: A Scandall
titles.description: After a nine-year-old girl drowns in a lake in Nainital, her father begins to experience hallucinations. A film school camera crew heads to Nainital hoping to document these paranormal activities, but instead, they are drawn into a terrifying mystery.
titles.shortDescription: Hoping to document some paranormal activities, a film school camera crew is instead drawn into a terrifying mystery.

titles.title: Ghayal Once Again
titles.description: When four teenage kids out on a college photography assignment accidentally uncover a murder, they find themselves up against one of the city's most prominent businessmen. Pursued by powerful forces, the teens turn to a corruption-fighting investigative journalist to save them from retribution.
titles.shortDescription: When a video of his mentor's murder surfaces, an investigative journalist (Sunny Deol) takes action to find the killers.

titles.title: Sanam Re
titles.description: A career-focused man finds solace when he reunites with his childhood sweetheart.
titles.shortDescription: A career-focused man finds solace when he reunites with his childhood sweetheart.

titles.title: The Intern
titles.description: Comedy drama starring Robert De Niro and Anne Hathaway. A 70 year old widower, discovers that retirement isn't all that. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes an intern at an online fashion site, founded by Jules Ostin.
titles.shortDescription: Comedy drama starring Robert De Niro and Anne Hathaway. A 70 year old widower, discovers that retirement isn't all that. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes an intern at an online fashion site, founded by Jules Ostin.

titles.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
titles.description: Four friends named Adam, Lou, Craig, and Jacob are stuck in their dull boring lives where they have made some huge mistakes in their pasts. One day, while they all get immensely drunk in the hot tub, they wake up to find themselves in 1986 and receive a chance from fate to undo their mistakes and brighten their future.
titles.shortDescription: Four friends are stuck in their dull lives where they have made some huge mistakes in their pasts. One day, they all get immensely drunk in the hot tub and wake up to find themselves in 1986, receiving a chance to undo their mistakes.

titles.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
titles.description: Toula Portokalos, a Greek woman in her 30s who works at her aunt's travel agency, falls in love with a tall handsome and non-Greek teacher, Ian Miller. The feelings are reciprocated by him as well. This film portrays her struggles as she prepares for her big day while simultaneously trying to get her huge family to accept him despite being aware of the fact that his being a foreigner and a vegetarian is going to upset her father.
titles.shortDescription: A Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek man. This film portrays her struggles as she tries to get her family to accept him despite being aware of the fact that his being a foreigner and a vegetarian is going to upset her father.

titles.title: The Mask
titles.description: Stanley Ipkiss is an ordinary clerk at the bank. But his life becomes the most unordinary when he discovers a mask that contains the spirit of the Norse god Loki. He becomes an entirely different person when he puts on the mask; a mischievous person that spreads chaos, a playboy who emanates confidence and a criminal who robs a bank!
titles.shortDescription: Stanley Ipkiss is an ordinary clerk at the bank. But his life becomes the most unordinary when he discovers a mask that contains the spirit of the Norse god Loki and becomes an entirely different person when he puts it on.

titles.title: Zookeeper
titles.description: The animals at the Franklin Park Zoo love their kindhearted caretaker, Griffin Keyes. Finding himself more comfortable with a lion than a lady, Griffin decides the only way to get a girl in his life is to leave the zoo and find a more glamorous job. The animals, in a panic, decide to break their time-honored code of silence and reveal their biggest secret: they can talk! To keep Griffin from leaving, they decide to teach him the rules of courtship - animal style.
titles.shortDescription: The animals at a zoo decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper (Kevin James) gain the attention of one particular woman.

titles.title: Be Cool
titles.description: John Travolta is back as Mafia loan shark turned Hollywood producer Chili Palmer in this sequel to "Get Shorty". This time, Chili finds himself in the world of rock stars, pop divas, and hip-hop gangsters when a new idea for a movie leads him into the music business. Will his wise-guy attitude succeed in the ever-changing world of music or will more people just end up dead?
titles.shortDescription: Accompanied by a host of all-star cameos, John Travolta is back as Mafia loan shark turned Hollywood producer Chili Palmer in this sequel to "Get Shorty".

titles.title: HOT PURSUIT
titles.description: An uptight policewoman named Cooper is ecstatic about her task of escorting Daniella Riva from San Antonio so she and her husband can give evidence against a drug boss. As she reaches her place of residence, several criminal policemen and gunmen show up that wreak havoc in the place. They attack and kill Danielle's husband, while Cooper quickly gets her away from the mayhem. As the two women strive for their safety, they must use their wits to dodge the criminals.
titles.shortDescription: A policewoman is tasked with escorting Daniella so she and her husband can give evidence against a drug boss. As she reaches her place, several criminal policemen show up and kill Danielle's husband, while Cooper quickly gets her away from the mayhem.

titles.title: Men At Work
titles.description: Two garbage men named Carl Taylor and James St. James find a local politician’s corpse in one of their cans. Together with their supervisor, they decide to take the matters to solve the case and to take the whole operation down in their own hands, all the while hiding the body from the cops.
titles.shortDescription: Two garbage men find a local politician’s corpse in one of their cans. Together with their supervisor, they decide to take the matters to solve the case and to take the whole operation down in their own hands, all the while hiding the body from the cops.

titles.title: Yes Man
titles.description: Carl Allen is stuck in his life always saying "no" to everything. Until, one day when he attends a self-help seminar and learns to say "yes" to anything and everything. He watches as his life takes on a new amazing turn by being affirmative to everything. Getting promoted in his job and finding a girlfriend are just one of the few benefits that he reaped by saying the magical word.
titles.shortDescription: Carl Allen is stuck in his life always saying "no" to everything. Until, one day when he attends a self-help seminar and learns to say "yes" to everything. He watches as his life takes on a new amazing turn by being affirmative to everything.

titles.title: Two Weeks Notice
titles.description: In order to save the community center, a devoted environmental lawyer Lucy Kelson starts working for the Wade Corporation. Incapable of making his own decision, George becomes so reliant on her that he starts asking for her guidance on everything. This infuriates Lucy so much that she gives her boss a two weeks' notice and decides to walk out on him. As her two weeks' period comes close to an end, she begins to realize if she really wants to desert George.
titles.shortDescription: A devoted environmental lawyer Lucy Kelson starts working for the Wade Corporation. But when she discovers that her boss is incapable of making his own decision and needs her advice on everything, she decides to walk out on him.

titles.title: Horrible Bosses
titles.description: Three guys Nick, Dale, and Kurt, all have horrible bosses and they would do absolutely anything to avenge them. Walking out on their jobs is not an option, so the drunk versions of the friends devise a plan to murder their bosses and get rid of them permanently. There is only one problem now: even the best of plans are only as clever as the person who came up with them.
titles.shortDescription: Nick, Dale, and Kurt have horrible bosses and they would do anything to avenge them. Walking out on their jobs is not an option, so with the help of alcohol and dubious advice from a criminal, they devise a plan to get rid of them, permanently.

titles.title: Elf
titles.description: One Christmas Eve, a baby named Buddy is accidentally transported to the North Pole when he crawls in Santa's bag of gifts. He is raised among the elves where he is almost thrice the size of every other. When he learns that he is not a real elf, he moves to New York in an attempt to find a place where he fits and to find his biological father.
titles.shortDescription: One Christmas Eve, a baby is accidentally transported to the North Pole when he crawls in Santa's bag of gifts. He is raised among the elves but when he finds that he is not a real elf, he moves to New York in an attempt to find his biological father.

titles.title: Get Shorty
titles.description: Chili Palmer is a loan shark-turned-debt collector who's arrived in Las Vegas to collect his dues. While there, he also decides to pick up debts from an LA movie producer named Harry Zimm. Once he arrives in Hollywood, though, his plans change a little - he now wants to make a film inspired by his life, so he starts working with Zimm to build a budget, a cast, and a production team. But, technically, nobody really has the money and everyone is indebted to some loan shark or another.
titles.shortDescription: A Miami mobster (John Travolta) is sent to collect a debt from a Hollywood producer (Gene Hackman). Instead, he ends up pitching his own life story as a movie.

titles.title: Horrible Bosses 2
titles.description: The clumsy trio is back for more! In this comedy crime film, Nick, Kurt and Dale try to make it in the world of entrepreneurs, where only sharks can survive. Keep your guard up, horrible bosses are everywhere!
titles.shortDescription: The clumsy trio is back for more! In this comedy crime film, Nick, Kurt and Dale try to make it in the world of entrepreneurs, where only sharks can survive. Keep your guard up, horrible bosses are everywhere!

titles.title: The Pink Panther 2
titles.description: When the world's greatest treasures, including the Pink Panther diamond, are stolen, only one man can solve the mystery: the air-headed Inspector Clouseau. Together with his partner Ponton and a team of international detectives, the bumbling detective must catch the thief and retrieve the artifacts - without causing too much collateral damage.
titles.shortDescription: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau (Steve Martin) teams up with a squad of international detectives to stop a thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

titles.title: The Pink Panther
titles.description: When the massive, priceless Pink Panther diamond ring is stolen and the internationally renowned coach for the French soccer team is killed, the French government has to depend on Inspector Jacques Clouseau to solve the case. It's pretty obvious this won't be an easy case for the air-headed Inspector Clouseau, but Chief Inspector Dreyfus wants to control the case from behind the scenes and make Clouseau take responsibility for mistakes along the way.
titles.shortDescription: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau (Steve Martin) must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

titles.title: Analyze This
titles.description: When a mob boss, Paul Vitti, is experiencing symptoms of having trouble breathing, sleeping and is distant with everyone, he visits a doctor and is diagnosed with anxiety attacks. He seeks the help of a psychiatrist, Dr. Ben Sobel, who is pushed into treating him. As Sobel sets on treating his most disturbed patient ever, he also has to deal with a fiancee who refuses to let anything come between her marriage.
titles.shortDescription: When a mob boss is diagnosed with anxiety attacks, he seeks the help of a psychiatrist, Dr. Ben Sobel, who is pushed into treating him. As Sobel sets on treating his most disturbed patient ever, he also has to deal with his uncompromising fiancee.

titles.title: BARBERSHOP 2: BACK IN BUSINESS
titles.description: Calvin Palmer, the owner of a barbershop tries to keep his family business alive so that one day when his son grows up, he can take it over. His old employees still all work in his shop. However, Calvin's barbershop is threatened when a barbershop named Nappy Cutz opens its franchise across the street, leading him to strive to keep his, once easy going business, running.
titles.shortDescription: Calvin Palmer tries to keep his family business of a barbershop alive so that one day, his son can take it over. His barbershop is threatened when a new barbershop opens its franchise across the street, leading him to strive to keep his running.

titles.title: Barbershop
titles.description: Calvin, who inherited the struggling business from his deceased father, views the shop as nothing but a burden and a waste of his time. After selling the shop to a local loan shark, Calvin slowly begins to see his father's vision and legacy and struggles with the notion that he just sold it out.
titles.shortDescription: A smart comedy about a day in the life of a struggling family-owned barbershop on the south side of Chicago.

titles.title: Analyze That
titles.description: Ever since he is prisoned, Mobster Paul Vitti has been acting weirdly: sometimes weeping like a child or singing his tunes. Taking this behavior into account, prison authorities release him early under the custody of his psychiatrist, Dr. Ben Sobel. Having problems of his own, Sobel is devastated to find that Vitti will be moving into his home. Furthermore, Vitti's old crew is after him frightened that he does not pass along any confidential information.
titles.shortDescription: Ever since he is prisoned, Mobster Paul Vitti has been acting weirdly. Prison authorities release him early under the custody of his psychiatrist, Dr. Ben Sobel, who is devastated to find that Vitti will be moving into his home.

titles.title: 17 Again
titles.description: A high-school basketball star, Mike O'Donnel, now a middle-aged man wakes up one day to find he is 17 again. He had everything back at high-school and just when his future couldn't seem any brighter, he sacrificed it all to be with his expectant girlfriend. He gets a second shot at life, a chance to rewrite his life and save his miserable marriage. However, his world turns upside down when his own teenage daughter, unaware that Mike is his father, has a crush on him.
titles.shortDescription: A middle-aged father wakes up one day to find he is 17 again. He had everything back in high school but he sacrificed it all to be with his girlfriend. He gets a second shot at life, a chance to rewrite his life!

titles.title: Pretty Little Liars
titles.description: Time passes by since Alison went missing. Being the leader of the group, only she was aware of the girls' secrets. Until, one day, Spencer Hastings, Aria Montgomery, Hanna Marin and Emily Fields start receiving messages from a mysterious 'A', threatening to reveal the secrets only Alison knew. At first, the girls think Alison herself is behind them, but they soon realize that they are wrong, and someone else is keeping a close eye on them.
titles.shortDescription: Time passes by since Alison went missing. Being the leader of the group, only she was aware of the girls' secrets. Until, one day, the girls start receiving messages from a mysterious 'A', threatening to reveal the secrets only Alison knew.

titles.title: The Flash
titles.description: After being struck by dark matter lightning in his lab, forensic scientist Barry Allen develops the ability to move at superhuman speed. Barry discovers that many other people were affected by the event – most of whom are using their newfound powers for evil. Determined to be a force for good, Barry becomes ‘The Flash’, and dedicates his life to fighting these threats. However, secret forces are determined to manipulate him for their own agenda.
titles.shortDescription: After being struck by dark matter lightning, a forensic scientist uses his new powers of super speed to become a superhero – The Flash.

titles.title: The Rook
titles.description: Myfanwy Thomas wakes up in the rain beside London’s Millennium Bridge with no memory of who she is and no way to explain the dead bodies around her. When Myfanwy discovers she is a high-ranking official in the Checquy, Britain’s last secret service for people with paranormal abilities, she will have to navigate the world of the agency to uncover who wiped her memory and why she is a target.
titles.shortDescription: When a woman wakes up surrounded by dead bodies with her memory erased, she must uncover her mysterious past to learn the truth.

titles.title: The 100
titles.description: Ninety-seven years after nuclear radiation rendered the Earth uninhabitable for human survival, a group of one hundred young law-breakers is sent to Earth from 'The Ark' as a test to see if humans can survive there. As they strive to make their survival possible, they soon learn that they are not the only ones residing on Earth, and for those who are already present, they are not welcome at all.
titles.shortDescription: Ninety-seven years after nuclear radiation rendered the Earth uninhabitable for human survival, a group of one hundred young law-breakers is sent to Earth from 'The Ark' as a test to see if humans can survive there.

titles.title: Vikings
titles.description: Frustrated by the policies of the local chieftain who sends his Viking raiders to the poor Baltic states of the east, Ragnar Lothbrok works on a secret plan to head west, across the ocean, to discover rich new civilizations. When Ragnar teams up with his boat builder friend Floki to craft a new generation of intrepid ships capable of conquering the rough northern seas, the stage is set for conflict.
titles.shortDescription: Hugely popular historical drama series about the brutal world of a Viking warrior who yearns to explore – and raid – the distant shores across the ocean.

titles.title: Britannia
titles.description: When the Romans invade Britain in 43AD, Kerra, daughter of the King of the Cantii, is forced to join with arch-rival Queen Antedia to face their invaders. The Romans are determined to succeed where Caesar failed and conquer this mythical land at the far edge of the Roman Empire. As tribes and Druids unite to fight the Romans, Kerra is thrust into the most important role of her life as she spearheads the resistance against the might of the Roman army.
titles.shortDescription: In 43AD the Roman army returns to crush Britannia, a mysterious land led by warrior women and druids who channel powerful underworld forces.

titles.title: Taboo
titles.description: Believed to be long dead, James Keziah Delaney returns home to 1814 London after ten years in Africa to inherit what is left of his father's shipping empire and rebuild a life for himself. But his father's legacy is a poisoned chalice, and Delaney finds himself in a face-off against the East India Company, whilst playing a dangerous game between two warring nations – Britain and America. With enemies lurking in every dark corner, James must navigate increasingly complex territories to avoid his own death sentence. Encircled by conspiracy, murder, and betrayal, a dark family mystery unfolds.
titles.shortDescription: Returning to London after ten years away, a 19th-century adventurer (Tom Hardy) discovers he has been left a mysterious legacy by his father. Executive produced by Ridley Scott.

titles.title: Arrow
titles.description: A billionaire playboy, Oliver Queen, presumed dead by everyone, was stranded on an island for five years. He returns home with just one goal in mind, to protect his city from the criminals. In the eyes of citizens, he is a wealthy business tycoon, but secretly, he battles crimes and punishes criminals as a vigilante known by the name of Hood.
titles.shortDescription: A billionaire playboy presumed dead by everyone, returns home after five years, with just one goal in mind, to protect his city from the criminals. In the eyes of citizens, he is a wealthy businessman, but secretly, he battles crimes as a vigilante.

titles.title: Zookeeper
titles.description: The animals at the Franklin Park Zoo love their kindhearted caretaker, Griffin Keyes. Finding himself more comfortable with a lion than a lady, Griffin decides the only way to get a girl in his life is to leave the zoo and find a more glamorous job. The animals, in a panic, decide to break their time-honored code of silence and reveal their biggest secret: they can talk! To keep Griffin from leaving, they decide to teach him the rules of courtship - animal style.
titles.shortDescription: The animals at a zoo decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper (Kevin James) gain the attention of one particular woman.

titles.title: Summer Catch
titles.description: Local boy Ryan Dunne, who serves as a pitcher for the prestigious Cape Cod League, falls in love with a beautiful wealthy girl, Tenley Parrish, whose family summers on the Cape Cod. Much to the dismay of Tenley's parents, the two get romantically involved with each other. While their romance catches fire, Ryan must also strive to make his dream of becoming a major league baseball player come true.
titles.shortDescription: Ryan Dunne, a pitcher for the prestigious Cape Cod League, falls in love with a beautiful wealthy girl, Tenley Parrish. While their romance catches fire, Ryan must also strive to make his dream of becoming a major league baseball player come true.

titles.title: Wedding Crashers
titles.description: Jeremy Klein and John Beckwith are divorce mediators who spend their free time crashing wedding receptions. For the irrepressible duo, there are few better ways to drink for free and womanize. So when Secretary of the Treasury William Cleary announces the wedding of his daughter, the pair makes it their mission to crash the high-profile event. But their game hits a bump when John locks eyes with bridesmaid Claire.
titles.shortDescription: A pair of committed womanizers (Vince Vaughn, Owen Wilson) sneak into weddings to take advantage of everything including the bridesmaids.

titles.title: He's Just Not That Into You
titles.description: A group of friends and lovers are facing complexities in their relationships. While Gigi struggles to decipher the mixed signals she receives from men she is dating, her coworker Janine has trust issues with her husband who is contemplating an affair with a beautiful woman, Anna. Beth asks for commitment from Neil, who has absolutely no interest in getting married and Mary is stuck between a group of her gay friends.
titles.shortDescription: A group of Baltimore-based friends and lovers are facing complexities in their relationships. This movie portrays the struggles of being single as well as in a relationship and the consequences of misreading others' behaviors.

titleLocalized.en: He's Just Not That Into You

titles.title: Legally Blonde
titles.description: The beautiful and popular Elle Woods (Reese Witherspoon) has it all and she now wants nothing more than to be Mrs. Warner Huntington III. But there is one thing stopping her boyfriend (Matthew Davis) from proposing: Elle is just too blonde for his East Coast blue blood family. Elle rallies all of her resources and gets into Harvard, determined to prove him wrong and win him back.
titles.shortDescription: A blonde sorority queen (Reese Witherspoon) decides to follow her ex-boyfriend to law school where she learns she has more legal savvy than she imagined.

titles.title: Valentine's Day
titles.description: As Valentine's Day approaches, residents of Los Angeles experience the ups and downs of being in a relationship. Where, on the one hand, tragic breakups occur, there on the other hand marriage proposals take place: A movie that portrays the lives of a busy florist, a doctor, a businessman, a school teacher and a military captain as they go through their first dates, crushes and marital commitments.
titles.shortDescription: As Valentine's Day approaches, residents of Los Angeles experience the ups and downs of being in a relationship. Where, on the one hand tragic breakups occur, there on the other hand marriage proposals take place.

titles.title: Chasing Liberty
titles.description: Every family has a rebel. Anna Foster, the daughter of the president of the United States, is one of them. She just wants an ordinary life but her father has deprived her of that, what with his agents following her everywhere. Frustrated, she makes her father promise that only two agents will go with her to a concert, but when her father doesn't keep his promise, she makes an escape and meets attractive Ben Calder. As she begins her romantic journey with him, she is unaware of his true identity.
titles.shortDescription: Every family has a rebel. Anna Foster, the daughter of the president of the United States, is one of them. She just wants an ordinary life but her father has deprived her of that. Frustrated, she makes an escape with the attractive Ben Calder.

titles.title: Four Weddings And A Funeral
titles.description: Lovable Englishman Charles and his group of friends seem to be unlucky in love. When Charles meets a beautiful American named Carrie at a wedding, he thinks his luck may have changed. But, after one magical night, Carrie returns to the States, ending what might have been. As Charles and Carrie's paths continue to cross - over a handful of nuptials and one funeral - he comes to believe they are meant to be together, even if their timing always seems to be off.
titles.shortDescription: Acclaimed comedy about the intermittent romance between two people who always seem to run into each other at weddings.

titles.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
titles.description: Toula Portokalos, a Greek woman in her 30s who works at her aunt's travel agency, falls in love with a tall handsome and non-Greek teacher, Ian Miller. The feelings are reciprocated by him as well. This film portrays her struggles as she prepares for her big day while simultaneously trying to get her huge family to accept him despite being aware of the fact that his being a foreigner and a vegetarian is going to upset her father.
titles.shortDescription: A Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek man. This film portrays her struggles as she tries to get her family to accept him despite being aware of the fact that his being a foreigner and a vegetarian is going to upset her father.

titles.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
titles.description: When she's fired from her job at an upscale law firm for voicing her stance against the testing of cosmetics on animals, Elle Woods heads to Capitol Hill to fight for her cause before Congress, leaving her boyfriend Emmett behind. Once there, she runs into plenty of adversity and red-tape and can't seem to find anyone who will listen to her proposals. While staying at the Watergate hotel, she meets and befriends an elderly bellman, and with his help, Elle convinces a disillusioned US Representative to help her get her voice heard.
titles.shortDescription: Elle (Reese Witherspoon) fights animal rights in Washington and shows platinum hair is a girl's best weapon.

titles.title: You've Got Mail
titles.description: Two business rivals: children bookstore owner, Kathleen Kelly, and the owner of a corporate Foxbooks chain store, Joe Fox, fall in love with each other over the internet. Unaware of each other's true identities, they do not know that they despise one another in real life. However, when Joe discovers that the woman he loves is actually his business rival, he is torn between his love for her over the internet and his dislike for her in real life.
titles.shortDescription: Two business rivals, Kathleen Kelly and Joe Fox fall in love with each other over the internet. Unaware of each other's true identities, they do not know that they despise one another in real life.

titles.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
titles.description: Cal Weaver is living a perfect life. He has everything he ever wished for: a dream job, great kids, a beautiful house and a wonderful gorgeous wife. However, his life takes on a new turn when he discovers that his wife, Emily, had been disloyal to him and is now asking for a divorce. So he enters the world of dating in his forties seeking to rediscover his manhood. With the help of his new friend, Jacob Palmer, who is himself a hit with the ladies, he learns how to pick on women.
titles.shortDescription: Cal Weaver is living a perfect life until he discovers that his wife, Emily, had been disloyal to him and is now asking for a divorce. So he enters the world of dating and with the help of his new friend, learns how to pick on women.

titles.title: Life as We Know It
titles.description: After their disastrous first date, Holly Berenson and Eric Messer plan to never see each other. But fate has other plans for them and they are once again united after they unexpectedly become godparents to Sophie, an orphaned infant child whose parents die in an accident. Learning to bear each other whilst trying to put aside their differences for the sake of their goddaughter, they work towards her brought up and try to become a family.
titles.shortDescription: After their disastrous first date, Holly and Eric plan to never see each other. But fate has other plans for them and they are once again united after they unexpectedly become godparents to an orphaned infant child whose parents die in an accident.

titles.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
titles.description: Connor Mead, a celebrity photographer, is leading a carefree, fun-filled life, having relationships with several women simultaneously. While attending his brother's wedding, he encounters the woman of his dreams, Jenny Perotti. Drunk, when Connor leaves for the bathroom, he sees the ghost of his uncle Wayne, who taught him how to hit on girls in his life. His ghost tells him that by night, he will encounter three ghosts who will lead him on his journey to romantic past, present and future.
titles.shortDescription: A celebrity photographer is leading a carefree life. While attending his brother's wedding, he sees his uncle Wayne's ghost that tells him that by night, he will meet three ghosts who will lead him on his journey to a romantic past, present and future.

titles.title: A Cinderella Story
titles.description: A teenage girl in California, Sam, is forced by her step-mother and step-sisters to work as a janitor and do the dishes in her stepmother's diner. She befriends a guy that she met online and really looks forward to meeting him. They choose to meet each other at the school's Halloween dance. But nothing ever goes as planned and she might not even get the chance to go on a dream date with her prince charming, who is none other than the coolest guy at school.
titles.shortDescription: A teenage girl, Sam, is forced to work as a janitor and do the dishes in her stepmother's diner. She befriends a guy through the internet and they plan to meet at the school's Halloween dance. But nothing ever goes as planned!

titles.title: The Wedding Singer
titles.description: A very popular wedding singer named Adam Sandler gets left at the altar by his fiancée, which breaks his heart. Just when he is about to lose all hopes of happiness, a beautiful young woman named Julia catches his attention and he falls for her instantly, but she is already engaged and about to get married to her fiancé. Will Adam be able to win her heart before she gets married?
titles.shortDescription: A very popular wedding singer, Adam, gets left at the altar by his fiancée. A young woman catches his attention and he falls for her instantly, but she is already engaged. Will Adam be able to win her heart before she gets married?

titles.title: Rumor Has It
titles.description: Sarah Huttinger travels to her home state, California from the New York City, to attend her sister's wedding. On her trip, she discovers some mind-boggling facts about her family: like how her family had been the inspiration behind a popular film, "The Graduate" and how her grandmother might actually be Mrs. Robinson. She wants her questions to be answered now. Especially the one that could she be the daughter of a successful tech company CEO, Beau Burroughs?
titles.shortDescription: Sarah Huttinger travels to her home state, California, to attend her sister's wedding. On her trip, she discovers some mind-boggling facts about her family: like how her family has been the inspiration behind a popular film, "The Graduate".

titles.title: Legally Blondes
titles.description: When Isabelle and Annabelle, Elle Woods' British twin cousins, move to Los Angeles to attend a fancy new prep school, they discover that their classmates are anything but welcoming. When they're framed by the school's snobbish elite for a crime they didn't commit, the two legally-minded blondes use their cleverness and charm to prove their innocence.
titles.shortDescription: Elle Woods' British twin cousins, Isabelle and Annabelle, experience complete culture shock when they move to Los Angeles to attend a new prep school.

titles.title: Bunker
titles.description: A young man living in a post-apocalyptic shelter struggles with a mysterious message luring him to venture outside.

titles.title: Ice Cream
titles.description: Two stranger meet for the first time and realize that they can talk their hearts out without any judgment. They begin to bond over the conversation and even happen to be similar in life. But their time is limited and they have to part ways.

titles.title: The Blue Hands
titles.description: The pianist burned his hands in fire. He cannot play, and that drives him crazy. His daughter helps him cope with the pain, but he does not notice her cares and pushes her away. All he wants is to play and shine on stage.

titles.description: The story revolves around a man named Vishnu, who recently lost his wife and is now struggling to get out of depression. He fails to connect to his son Sujal and doesn't talk to anyone. The only one he talks to is a Tree.

titles.description: This is the story of a girl, trapped inside the body of a boy. Since childhood, she knew she was a girl and that someday she will have to break off her shackles and tell the truth to everyone.

titles.title: Paroxysm
titles.description: On a fateful rainy night, a family of three will have to go through an evil spirit lurking around and fight through their insecurities to welcome a new member in their house. A chain of events leads to a shocking climax in this short psychological horror thriller.

titles.description: Good and evil have always competed to win humans hearts. Adam is a short film which tries to illustrate that from a rather subjective standpoint, a situation symbolic of this eternal battle between good and evil.

titles.title: The Parable Of Little Evil
titles.description: Once a traveler got lost in a snowy forest. For several days his frozen feet were stuck in cold snow and death was somewhere near. Just when he was ready to surrender, a mysterious woman comes to his rescue.

titles.title: Chikati
titles.description: Chikati is about the struggles of a young boy whose father abandons him and his grandfather as he is unable to repay the loan. Gopal thinks his father would return once the loan is cleared, so he starts working in farms and sells items to make money.

titles.title: The Wireless
titles.description: An artillery scout gets stuck in an impasse situation without any water. In an accidental eavesdropping on a military transceiver, he finds out that the enemy soldier is in a similar situation except without any food so he decides to communicate and exchange food and water with him.

titles.description: They met, only to part- they parted, but did they meet again? A rendition of Sana and Samar's story as they negotiate their lives and loves in a quest to find the true love of their lives.

titles.description: A cafe harbors three stories; an ex-serial killer controlling the urges to kill his date, a guy who cons his girlfriend and a death artist practicing dying in different places.

titles.title: Stragglers
titles.description: During a modern civil war in the United Kingdom, a small group of refugees journey across the country to escape the war led by Howell, a frustrated and bitter smuggler. One night they discover a mysterious young man who may be the key to their survival.

titles.description: The film narrates a tale of a hapless 8-year-old named Gulshan, who is going through one of the worst phase of his life, but by the time the story ends, things start to change for him in a way that they will have very far reaching consequences.

titles.description: Inspired by a true story. An orphan girl draws her mother on the floor of an orphanage in Iraq. She takes off her shoes and lays on the design to be able to feel the love of her mother who died in the Iraq war. Other orphaned girls do the same and then all dream of their mothers.

titles.title: Under The Scarf
titles.description: Mehrin is just like any other teenage girl trying to navigate her way through high school. What sets her apart from the everyday teenage girl? She is a Muslim Bangladeshi political asylum immigrant and once her headscarf is on, she's deemed a stereotype.

titles.description: Story of an educated young man living in a city abroad with no concern about his family back home. One fine day, he experiences an unexpected event that gives him terrible time making him rethink his life. He wakes up to reality with repentance.
